--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/api/auth/login/route.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
 2 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
 3 | import bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
 4 | import jwt from 'jsonwebtoken';
 5 | import { LoginWithTenantDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 6 | import { getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
 7 | import * as tenantSchema from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
 8 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 9 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
10 | 
11 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';
12 | 
13 | export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
14 |   try {
15 |     const body = await request.json();
16 |     const { tenantId, email, password } = LoginWithTenantDto.parse(body);
17 | 
18 |     log.info({ tenantId, email }, '[API] Login attempt.');
19 | 
20 |     const tenantDb = await getTenantDb(tenantId);
21 |     const userResult = await tenantDb.query.users.findFirst({
22 |       where: eq(tenantSchema.users.email, email),
23 |     });
24 | 
25 |     if (!userResult) {
26 |       log.warn({ tenantId, email }, '[API] Login failed: User not found.');
27 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid credentials' }, { status: 401 });
28 |     }
29 | 
30 |     const isPasswordValid = await bcrypt.compare(password, userResult.password);
31 |     if (!isPasswordValid) {
32 |       log.warn({ tenantId, email }, '[API] Login failed: Invalid password.');
33 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid credentials' }, { status: 401 });
34 |     }
35 | 
36 |     const token = jwt.sign({ tenantId, userId: userResult.id }, env.JWT_SECRET, { expiresIn: '8h' });
37 |     log.info({ tenantId, userId: userResult.id }, '[API] Login successful.');
38 | 
39 |     const response = NextResponse.json({ message: 'Login successful' });
40 |     response.cookies.set('authToken', token, {
41 |       httpOnly: true,
42 |       secure: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production',
43 |       sameSite: 'strict',
44 |       path: '/',
45 |       maxAge: 8 * 60 * 60, // 8 hours
46 |     });
47 | 
48 |     console.log('Setting cookie for domain:', process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? '.localhost' : '.yourdomain.com');
49 |     console.log('Request host:', request.headers.get('host'));
50 |     console.log('Response Set-Cookie:', response.headers.get('set-cookie'));
51 | 
52 |     return response;
53 | 
54 |   } catch (err) {
55 |     log.error({ error: err }, '[API] Login process failed.');
56 |     if (err instanceof Error && err.message === 'Tenant not found') {
57 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid tenant specified' }, { status: 404 });
58 |     }
59 |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'An internal error occurred' }, { status: 500 });
60 |   }
61 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/api/tenants/route.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | // In /app/api/tenants/route.ts
 2 | 
 3 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
 4 | import bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
 5 | import { TenantSignupDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 6 | import { createNeonProject } from '@/lib/neon/api';
 7 | import { mainDb, getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
 8 | import { tenants } from '@/lib/db/schema/shared';
 9 | import * as tenantSchema from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
10 | import { encrypt } from '@/lib/crypto';
11 | import { runTenantMigrations } from '@/lib/db/migrate';
12 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
13 | import z from 'zod';
14 | 
15 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';
16 | 
17 | export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
18 |   let neonProjectId: string | null = null;
19 |   try {
20 | const body = await request.json();
21 |     const data = TenantSignupDto.parse(body);
22 |     const { tenantId, orgName, adminName, adminEmail, adminPassword } = data;
23 | 
24 |     log.info({ tenantId }, '[API] Tenant creation request received.');
25 | 
26 |     // 1. Create the new database project on Neon
27 |     const neonProject = await createNeonProject(tenantId);
28 |     if (!neonProject || !neonProject.projectId || !neonProject.connectionString) {
29 |       throw new Error("Invalid response from Neon API during project creation.");
30 |     }
31 |     const { projectId: _neonProjectId, connectionString } = neonProject;
32 |     neonProjectId = _neonProjectId; // Assign to the outer scope variable for the catch block
33 |     console.log(`neonProject: ${JSON.stringify(neonProject)}`);
34 |     // 2. Store the new tenant's metadata in your main database
35 |     const encryptedConnectionString = encrypt(connectionString);
36 |     await mainDb.insert(tenants).values({
37 |       tenantId,
38 |       name: orgName,
39 |       neonProjectId: _neonProjectId, // Use the non-nullable constant here
40 |       connectionString: encryptedConnectionString,
41 |     });
42 |     log.info({ tenantId, neonProjectId }, '[API] Tenant metadata stored.');
43 | 
44 |     // 3. Run the migrations on the newly created tenant database
45 |     await runTenantMigrations(connectionString);
46 | 
47 |     // 4. Create the tenant's first admin user in their new database
48 |     const tenantDb = await getTenantDb(tenantId);
49 |     const hashedPassword = await bcrypt.hash(adminPassword, 12);
50 |     await tenantDb.insert(tenantSchema.users).values({
51 |       name: adminName,
52 |       email: adminEmail,
53 |       password: hashedPassword,
54 |     });
55 |     log.info({ tenantId, adminEmail }, '[API] Admin user created in tenant DB.');
56 | 
57 |     // 5. Done!
58 |     return NextResponse.json({ message: 'Tenant created successfully', tenantId });
59 | 
60 |   } catch (err) {
61 |     let errorDetails = {};
62 |     if (err instanceof Error) {
63 |         errorDetails = {
64 |             name: err.name,
65 |             message: err.message,
66 |             stack: err.stack,
67 |         };
68 |     } else {
69 |         errorDetails = { error: 'An unknown error occurred' };
70 |     }
71 |     
72 |     log.error({ ...errorDetails, neonProjectId }, '[API] Tenant creation failed.');
73 |     // --- END OF NEW CATCH BLOCK ---
74 | 
75 |     if (err instanceof z.ZodError) {
76 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid input', details: err }, { status: 400 });
77 |     }
78 |     console.log(`ERRROR:${JSON.stringify(err)}`)
79 |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal server error' }, { status: 500 });
80 |   }
81 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/layout.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import {getSession, UserSession} from "@/lib/session"
 2 | import { AppSidebar } from "@/components/app-sidebar"
 3 | import {
 4 |   SidebarInset,
 5 |   SidebarProvider,
 6 |   SidebarTrigger,
 7 | } from "@/components/ui/sidebar"
 8 | 
 9 | import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, BreadcrumbLink, BreadcrumbList, BreadcrumbPage, BreadcrumbSeparator } from "@/components/breadcrumbs";
10 | import { Separator } from "@/components/ui/separator";
11 | 
12 | 
13 | interface DashboardLayoutProps {
14 |   children: React.ReactNode;
15 | }
16 | export default async function DashboardLayout({ children }: DashboardLayoutProps) {
17 |   const session = await getSession();
18 |   // Compute nav data based on session (tenant/role-aware)
19 |   // This should be a function that returns sidebar nav data to create a sidebar nav for current logged in user.
20 |  // This is role based access, meaning based on the business logic, user roles, different navData willl be presented 
21 |  // for users. For example: When Tenant Admin logs in, in the sidebar nav, the tenant should see options like Users, Roles, Students, etc.... (Tenant Admin has highest Access)  
22 |  // Tenant admin will also see option for settings on the sidebar nav, where it will take to tenant admin specific setting. But when User like Teacher logs in or , Student logs in,
23 |  // they all will see distinct sidebar navs. An enterprise grade multi tenant saas applicaiton, dashbaord, dynamic, tenent context aware, secure and enterprise grade implementation.    
24 |   const navData = await getDashboardNavData(session);
25 |   return (
26 |       <SidebarProvider>
27 |         <AppSidebar
28 |             navData={navData}
29 |             user={{
30 |               name: session.name,
31 |               email: session.email,
32 |               avatar:"/public/notion-avatar-1753323104262.png", // use default png avatar (relative oatg):public/notion-avatar-1753323104262.png
33 |             }}
34 |         />
35 |         <SidebarInset>
36 |           <header className="flex h-16 shrink-0 items-center gap-2 transition-[width,height] ease-linear group-has-data-[collapsible=icon]/sidebar-wrapper:h-12">
37 |             <div className="flex items-center gap-2 px-4">
38 |               <SidebarTrigger className="-ml-1" />
39 |               <Separator orientation="vertical" className="mr-2 data-[orientation=vertical]:h-4" />
40 |               <Breadcrumb>
41 |                 <BreadcrumbList>
42 |                   <BreadcrumbItem className="hidden md:block">
43 |                     <BreadcrumbLink href="#">Dashboard</BreadcrumbLink>
44 |                   </BreadcrumbItem>
45 |                   <BreadcrumbSeparator className="hidden md:block" />
46 |                   <BreadcrumbItem>
47 |                     <BreadcrumbPage>{/* You can pass current page title here dynamically */}</BreadcrumbPage>
48 |                   </BreadcrumbItem>
49 |                 </BreadcrumbList>
50 |               </Breadcrumb>
51 |             </div>
52 |           </header>
53 |           <main className="flex-1 flex flex-col gap-4 p-4 pt-0">{children}</main>
54 |         </SidebarInset>
55 |       </SidebarProvider>
56 |   );
57 | }
58 | // You need to implement getDashboardNavData
59 | async function getDashboardNavData(session: UserSession) {
60 |   // Return navMain, projects, teams based on session.user.role, session.tenant, etc.
61 |   // This is pseudo-logic, implement as per your needs
62 |   return {
63 |     navMain: [],
64 |     projects: [],
65 |     teams: [],
66 |   }
67 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/nav-item.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client";
 2 | 
 3 | import Link from "next/link";
 4 | import { usePathname } from "next/navigation";
 5 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils";
 6 | 
 7 | export function NavItem({ href, children }: { href: string, children: React.ReactNode }) {
 8 |     const pathname = usePathname();
 9 |     const isActive = pathname === href;
10 | 
11 |     return (
12 |         <Link 
13 |             href={href} 
14 |             className={cn(
15 |                 "text-sm font-medium transition-colors hover:text-primary",
16 |                 isActive ? "text-primary" : "text-muted-foreground"
17 |             )}
18 |         >
19 |             {children}
20 |         </Link>
21 |     );
22 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/nav-main.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client"
 2 | import { ChevronRight, type LucideIcon } from "lucide-react"
 3 | 
 4 | import {
 5 |   SidebarGroup,
 6 |   SidebarGroupLabel,
 7 |   SidebarMenu,
 8 |   SidebarMenuButton,
 9 |   SidebarMenuItem,
10 |   SidebarMenuSub,
11 |   SidebarMenuSubButton,
12 |   SidebarMenuSubItem,
13 | } from "@/components/ui/sidebar"
14 | import { Collapsible, CollapsibleContent, CollapsibleTrigger } from "@/components/ui/collapsible"
15 | 
16 | export function NavMain({
17 |   items,
18 | }: {
19 |   items: {
20 |     title: string
21 |     url: string
22 |     icon?: LucideIcon
23 |     isActive?: boolean
24 |     items?: {
25 |       title: string
26 |       url: string
27 |     }[]
28 |   }[]
29 | }) {
30 |   return (
31 |     <SidebarGroup>
32 |       <SidebarGroupLabel>Platform</SidebarGroupLabel>
33 |       <SidebarMenu>
34 |         {items.map((item) => (
35 |           <Collapsible
36 |             key={item.title}
37 |             asChild
38 |             defaultOpen={item.isActive}
39 |             className="group/collapsible"
40 |           >
41 |             <SidebarMenuItem>
42 |               <CollapsibleTrigger asChild>
43 |                 <SidebarMenuButton tooltip={item.title}>
44 |                   {item.icon && <item.icon />}
45 |                   <span>{item.title}</span>
46 |                   <ChevronRight className="ml-auto transition-transform duration-200 group-data-[state=open]/collapsible:rotate-90" />
47 |                 </SidebarMenuButton>
48 |               </CollapsibleTrigger>
49 |               <CollapsibleContent>
50 |                 <SidebarMenuSub>
51 |                   {item.items?.map((subItem) => (
52 |                     <SidebarMenuSubItem key={subItem.title}>
53 |                       <SidebarMenuSubButton asChild>
54 |                         <a href={subItem.url}>
55 |                           <span>{subItem.title}</span>
56 |                         </a>
57 |                       </SidebarMenuSubButton>
58 |                     </SidebarMenuSubItem>
59 |                   ))}
60 |                 </SidebarMenuSub>
61 |               </CollapsibleContent>
62 |             </SidebarMenuItem>
63 |           </Collapsible>
64 |         ))}
65 |       </SidebarMenu>
66 |     </SidebarGroup>
67 |   )
68 | }

/app/dashboard/nav-projects.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client"
 2 | import {
 3 |   Folder,
 4 |   Forward,
 5 |   MoreHorizontal,
 6 |   Trash2,
 7 |   type LucideIcon,
 8 | } from "lucide-react"
 9 | import {
10 |   DropdownMenu,
11 |   DropdownMenuContent,
12 |   DropdownMenuItem,
13 |   DropdownMenuSeparator,
14 |   DropdownMenuTrigger,
15 | } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu"
16 | import {
17 |   SidebarGroup,
18 |   SidebarGroupLabel,
19 |   SidebarMenu,
20 |   SidebarMenuAction,
21 |   SidebarMenuButton,
22 |   SidebarMenuItem,
23 |   useSidebar,
24 | } from "@/components/ui/sidebar"
25 | export function NavProjects({
26 |   projects,
27 | }: {
28 |   projects: {
29 |     name: string
30 |     url: string
31 |     icon: LucideIcon
32 |   }[]
33 | }) {
34 |   const { isMobile } = useSidebar(false)
35 |     return (
36 |     <SidebarGroup className="group-data-[collapsible=icon]:hidden">
37 |       <SidebarGroupLabel>Projects</SidebarGroupLabel>
38 |       <SidebarMenu>
39 |         {projects.map((item) => (
40 |           <SidebarMenuItem key={item.name}>
41 |             <SidebarMenuButton asChild>
42 |               <a href={item.url}>
43 |                 <item.icon />
44 |                 <span>{item.name}</span>
45 |               </a>
46 |             </SidebarMenuButton>
47 |             <DropdownMenu>
48 |               <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
49 |                 <SidebarMenuAction showOnHover>
50 |                   <MoreHorizontal />
51 |                   <span className="sr-only">More</span>
52 |                 </SidebarMenuAction>
53 |               </DropdownMenuTrigger>
54 |               <DropdownMenuContent
55 |                 className="w-48 rounded-lg"
56 |                 side={isMobile ? "bottom" : "right"}
57 |                 align={isMobile ? "end" : "start"}
58 |               >
59 |                 <DropdownMenuItem>
60 |                   <Folder className="text-muted-foreground" />
61 |                   <span>View Project</span>
62 |                 </DropdownMenuItem>
63 |                 <DropdownMenuItem>
64 |                   <Forward className="text-muted-foreground" />
65 |                   <span>Share Project</span>
66 |                 </DropdownMenuItem>
67 |                 <DropdownMenuSeparator />
68 |                 <DropdownMenuItem>
69 |                   <Trash2 className="text-muted-foreground" />
70 |                   <span>Delete Project</span>
71 |                 </DropdownMenuItem>
72 |               </DropdownMenuContent>
73 |             </DropdownMenu>
74 |           </SidebarMenuItem>
75 |         ))}
76 |         <SidebarMenuItem>
77 |           <SidebarMenuButton className="text-sidebar-foreground/70">
78 |             <MoreHorizontal className="text-sidebar-foreground/70" />
79 |             <span>More</span>
80 |           </SidebarMenuButton>
81 |         </SidebarMenuItem>
82 |       </SidebarMenu>
83 |     </SidebarGroup>
84 |   )
85 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/page.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { getSession } from "@/lib/session";
 2 | import { getTenantDb } from "@/lib/db";
 3 | import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card";
 4 | import { Users, Folder } from "lucide-react";
 5 | import { sql } from "drizzle-orm";
 6 | 
 7 | async function getStats(tenantId: string) {
 8 |     const db = await getTenantDb(tenantId);
 9 |     
10 |     const userCountResult = await db.execute(sql`SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;`);
11 |     const roleCountResult = await db.execute(sql`SELECT COUNT(*) FROM roles;`);
12 | 
13 |     const userCount = Number((userCountResult.rows[0] as { count: string }).count);
14 |     const roleCount = Number((roleCountResult.rows[0] as { count: string }).count);
15 | 
16 |     return { userCount, roleCount };
17 | }
18 | 
19 | export default async function DashboardPage() {
20 |   const session = await getSession();
21 |   const stats = await getStats(session.tenantId);
22 | 
23 |   return (
24 |     <div className="space-y-4">
25 |       <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold">
26 |         Welcome back, {session.name}! ðŸ‘‹
27 |       </h1>
28 |       <p className="text-muted-foreground">
29 |         Here&apos;s a quick overview of your organization.
30 |       </p>
31 |       <div className="grid gap-4 md:grid-cols-2">
32 |         <Card>
33 |           <CardHeader className="flex flex-row items-center justify-between space-y-0 pb-2">
34 |             <CardTitle className="text-sm font-medium">Total Users</CardTitle>
35 |             <Users className="h-4 w-4 text-muted-foreground" />
36 |           </CardHeader>
37 |           <CardContent>
38 |             <div className="text-2xl font-bold">{stats.userCount}</div>
39 |           </CardContent>
40 |         </Card>
41 |         <Card>
42 |           <CardHeader className="flex flex-row items-center justify-between space-y-0 pb-2">
43 |             <CardTitle className="text-sm font-medium">Defined Roles</CardTitle>
44 |             <Folder className="h-4 w-4 text-muted-foreground" />
45 |           </CardHeader>
46 |           <CardContent>
47 |             <div className="text-2xl font-bold">{stats.roleCount}</div>
48 |           </CardContent>
49 |         </Card>
50 |       </div>
51 |     </div>
52 |   );
53 | }

/app/dashboard/roles/columns.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client"
 2 | 
 3 | import { ColumnDef } from "@tanstack/react-table"
 4 | import { MoreHorizontal } from "lucide-react"
 5 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
 6 | import {
 7 |   DropdownMenu,
 8 |   DropdownMenuContent,
 9 |   DropdownMenuItem,
10 |   DropdownMenuLabel,
11 |   DropdownMenuSeparator,
12 |   DropdownMenuTrigger,
13 | } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu"
14 | import { toast } from "sonner"
15 | import { deleteRole } from "@/lib/actions/role"
16 | import type { roles } from "@/lib/db/schema/tenant"
17 | 
18 | export type Role = typeof roles.$inferSelect;
19 | 
20 | export const getColumns = (
21 |     onEdit?: (role: Role) => void
22 | ): ColumnDef<Role>[] => [
23 |     {
24 |         accessorKey: "name",
25 |         header: "Name",
26 |     },
27 |     {
28 |         accessorKey: "description",
29 |         header: "Description",
30 |     },
31 |     {
32 |         id: "actions",
33 |         cell: ({ row }) => {
34 |             const role = row.original
35 | 
36 |             const handleDelete = async () => {
37 |                 if (window.confirm(`Are you sure you want to delete role "${role.name}"?`)) {
38 |                   const result = await deleteRole(role.id);
39 |                   if (result.success) {
40 |                     toast.success(result.message);
41 |                   } else {
42 |                     toast.error(result.message);
43 |                   }
44 |                 }
45 |             };
46 | 
47 |             return (
48 |                 <DropdownMenu>
49 |                     <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
50 |                         <Button variant="ghost" className="h-8 w-8 p-0">
51 |                             <span className="sr-only">Open menu</span>
52 |                             <MoreHorizontal className="h-4 w-4" />
53 |                         </Button>
54 |                     </DropdownMenuTrigger>
55 |                     <DropdownMenuContent align="end">
56 |                         <DropdownMenuLabel>Actions</DropdownMenuLabel>
57 |                         {onEdit && <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => onEdit(role)}>
58 |                             Edit Role
59 |                         </DropdownMenuItem>}
60 |                         <DropdownMenuSeparator />
61 |                         <DropdownMenuItem onClick={handleDelete} className="text-red-500 focus:text-red-500">
62 |                             Delete Role
63 |                         </DropdownMenuItem>
64 |                     </DropdownMenuContent>
65 |                 </DropdownMenu>
66 |             )
67 |         },
68 |     },
69 | ]


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/roles/data-table.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client"
 2 | 
 3 | import * as React from "react"
 4 | import {
 5 |   ColumnDef,
 6 |   flexRender,
 7 |   getCoreRowModel,
 8 |   useReactTable,
 9 | } from "@tanstack/react-table"
10 | import {
11 |   Table,
12 |   TableBody,
13 |   TableCell,
14 |   TableHead,
15 |   TableHeader,
16 |   TableRow,
17 | } from "@/components/ui/table"
18 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
19 | 
20 | import { getColumns, Role } from "./columns"
21 | import { RoleFormDialog } from "./role-form-dialog"
22 | 
23 | interface RolesDataTableProps {
24 |   data: Role[]
25 | }
26 | 
27 | export function RolesDataTable({ data }: RolesDataTableProps) {
28 |   const [isDialogOpen, setIsDialogOpen] = React.useState(false);
29 |   const [editingRole, setEditingRole] = React.useState<Role | null>(null);
30 | 
31 |   const handleEdit = React.useCallback((role: Role) => {
32 |     setEditingRole(role);
33 |     setIsDialogOpen(true);
34 |   }, []);
35 | 
36 |   const handleCreate = React.useCallback(() => {
37 |     setEditingRole(null);
38 |     setIsDialogOpen(true);
39 |   }, []);
40 |   
41 |   const columns: ColumnDef<Role>[] = React.useMemo(() => getColumns(handleEdit), [handleEdit]);
42 | 
43 |   const table = useReactTable({
44 |     data,
45 |     columns,
46 |     getCoreRowModel: getCoreRowModel(),
47 |   })
48 | 
49 |   return (
50 |     <div>
51 |         <div className="flex items-center justify-end py-4">
52 |             <Button onClick={handleCreate}>Create Role</Button>
53 |         </div>
54 |         <div className="rounded-md border">
55 |         <Table>
56 |             <TableHeader>
57 |             {table.getHeaderGroups().map((headerGroup) => (
58 |                 <TableRow key={headerGroup.id}>
59 |                 {headerGroup.headers.map((header) => (
60 |                     <TableHead key={header.id}>
61 |                         {flexRender(header.column.columnDef.header, header.getContext())}
62 |                     </TableHead>
63 |                 ))}
64 |                 </TableRow>
65 |             ))}
66 |             </TableHeader>
67 |             <TableBody>
68 |             {table.getRowModel().rows?.length ? (
69 |                 table.getRowModel().rows.map((row) => (
70 |                 <TableRow key={row.id}>
71 |                     {row.getVisibleCells().map((cell) => (
72 |                     <TableCell key={cell.id}>
73 |                         {flexRender(cell.column.columnDef.cell, cell.getContext())}
74 |                     </TableCell>
75 |                     ))}
76 |                 </TableRow>
77 |                 ))
78 |             ) : (
79 |                 <TableRow>
80 |                 <TableCell colSpan={columns.length} className="h-24 text-center">
81 |                     No roles found.
82 |                 </TableCell>
83 |                 </TableRow>
84 |             )}
85 |             </TableBody>
86 |         </Table>
87 |         </div>
88 |       <RoleFormDialog
89 |         key={editingRole?.id}
90 |         isOpen={isDialogOpen}
91 |         setIsOpen={setIsDialogOpen}
92 |         role={editingRole}
93 |       />
94 |     </div>
95 |   )
96 | }
97 |

11 |       <RolesDataTable data={roles} />

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/roles/role-form-dialog.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1 | "use client";
  2 | 
  3 | import React from 'react';
  4 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
  5 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
  6 | import {
  7 |   Dialog,
  8 |   DialogContent,
  9 |   DialogHeader,
 10 |   DialogTitle,
 11 |   DialogFooter,
 12 |   DialogDescription,
 13 | } from '@/components/ui/dialog';
 14 | import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
 15 | import { Input } from '@/components/ui/input';
 16 | import { toast } from 'sonner';
 17 | import { RoleFormSchema, RoleFormInput } from '@/lib/dto/role';
 18 | import { upsertRole } from '@/lib/actions/role';
 19 | import { Form, FormControl, FormField, FormItem, FormLabel, FormMessage } from '@/components/ui/form';
 20 | import type { Role } from './columns';
 21 | 
 22 | interface RoleFormDialogProps {
 23 |   isOpen: boolean;
 24 |   setIsOpen: (open: boolean) => void;
 25 |   role: Role | null;
 26 | }
 27 | 
 28 | export function RoleFormDialog({ isOpen, setIsOpen, role }: RoleFormDialogProps) {
 29 |   const isEditMode = !!role;
 30 | 
 31 |   // The useForm hook is now correctly typed with RoleFormInput
 32 |   const form = useForm<RoleFormInput>({
 33 |     resolver: zodResolver(RoleFormSchema),
 34 |     // We explicitly handle the possibility of `null` from the database
 35 |     // and provide default values that match the schema (`string` or `undefined`).
 36 |     defaultValues: {
 37 |         id: role?.id,
 38 |         name: role?.name || '',
 39 |         description: role?.description || '',
 40 |     },
 41 |   });
 42 | 
 43 |   const onSubmit = async (values: RoleFormInput) => {
 44 |     const result = await upsertRole(values);
 45 |     if (result.success) {
 46 |       toast.success(result.message);
 47 |       setIsOpen(false);
 48 |     } else {
 49 |       toast.error(result.message);
 50 |     }
 51 |   };
 52 | 
 53 |   return (
 54 |     <Dialog open={isOpen} onOpenChange={setIsOpen}>
 55 |       <DialogContent className="sm:max-w-[425px]">
 56 |         <DialogHeader>
 57 |           <DialogTitle>{isEditMode ? 'Edit Role' : 'Create New Role'}</DialogTitle>
 58 |           <DialogDescription>
 59 |             {isEditMode ? "Update the role's details below." : "Fill in the details to create a new role."}
 60 |           </DialogDescription>
 61 |         </DialogHeader>
 62 |         <Form {...form}>
 63 |             <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="space-y-4">
 64 |                 <FormField
 65 |                     control={form.control}
 66 |                     name="name"
 67 |                     render={({ field }) => (
 68 |                         <FormItem>
 69 |                             <FormLabel>Role Name</FormLabel>
 70 |                             <FormControl>
 71 |                                 <Input placeholder="e.g., Teacher" {...field} />
 72 |                             </FormControl>
 73 |                             <FormMessage />
 74 |                         </FormItem>
 75 |                     )}
 76 |                 />
 77 |                 <FormField
 78 |                     control={form.control}
 79 |                     name="description"
 80 |                     render={({ field }) => (
 81 |                         <FormItem>
 82 |                             <FormLabel>Description</FormLabel>
 83 |                             <FormControl>
 84 |                                 <Input placeholder="e.g., Can manage courses and students" {...field} />
 85 |                             </FormControl>
 86 |                             <FormMessage />
 87 |                         </FormItem>
 88 |                     )}
 89 |                 />
 90 |                 <DialogFooter>
 91 |                     <Button type="submit" disabled={form.formState.isSubmitting}>
 92 |                         {form.formState.isSubmitting ? 'Saving...' : 'Save Role'}
 93 |                     </Button>
 94 |                 </DialogFooter>
 95 |             </form>
 96 |         </Form>
 97 |       </DialogContent>
 98 |     </Dialog>
 99 |   );
100 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/tenant-provider.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | 'use client';
 2 | 
 3 | import { createContext, useContext, ReactNode } from 'react';
 4 | import type { users } from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
 5 | import type { tenants } from '@/lib/db/schema/shared';
 6 | 
 7 | type User = Omit<typeof users.$inferSelect, 'password'>;
 8 | type Tenant = typeof tenants.$inferSelect;
 9 | 
10 | interface TenantContextType {
11 |   user: User;
12 |   tenant: Tenant;
13 | }
14 | 
15 | const TenantContext = createContext<TenantContextType | null>(null);
16 | 
17 | export function TenantProvider({
18 |   user,
19 |   tenant,
20 |   children,
21 | }: {
22 |   user: User;
23 |   tenant: Tenant;
24 |   children: ReactNode;
25 | }) {
26 |   return (
27 |     <TenantContext.Provider value={{ user, tenant }}>
28 |       {children}
29 |     </TenantContext.Provider>
30 |   );
31 | }
32 | 
33 | export function useTenant() {
34 |   const context = useContext(TenantContext);
35 |   if (!context) {
36 |     throw new Error('useTenant must be used within a TenantProvider');
37 |   }
38 |   return context;
39 | }

/app/dashboard/users/columns.tsx:

 1 | "use client"
 2 | 
 3 | import { ColumnDef } from "@tanstack/react-table"
 4 | import { MoreHorizontal } from "lucide-react"
 5 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
 6 | import {
 7 |   DropdownMenu,
 8 |   DropdownMenuContent,
 9 |   DropdownMenuItem,
10 |   DropdownMenuLabel,
11 |   DropdownMenuSeparator,
12 |   DropdownMenuTrigger,
13 | } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu"
14 | import { deleteUserAction } from "@/lib/actions/user"
15 | import { toast } from "sonner"
16 | 
17 | export type User = {
18 |   id: number
19 |   name: string
20 |   email: string
21 |   roles: string
22 | }
23 | 
24 | export const getColumns = (onEdit: (user: User) => void): ColumnDef<User>[] => [
25 |     {
26 |         accessorKey: "name",
27 |         header: "Name",
28 |     },
29 |     {
30 |         accessorKey: "email",
31 |         header: "Email",
32 |     },
33 |     {
34 |         accessorKey: "roles",
35 |         header: "Roles",
36 |     },
37 |     {
38 |         id: "actions",
39 |         cell: ({ row }) => {
40 |             const user = row.original
41 | 
42 |             const handleDelete = async () => {
43 |                 if (window.confirm(`Are you sure you want to delete user ${user.name}?`)) {
44 |                   const result = await deleteUserAction(user.id);
45 |                   if (result.success) {
46 |                     toast.success(result.message);
47 |                   } else {
48 |                     toast.error(result.message);
49 |                   }
50 |                 }
51 |             };
52 | 
53 |             return (
54 |                 <DropdownMenu>
55 |                     <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
56 |                         <Button variant="ghost" className="h-8 w-8 p-0">
57 |                             <span className="sr-only">Open menu</span>
58 |                             <MoreHorizontal className="h-4 w-4" />
59 |                         </Button>
60 |                     </DropdownMenuTrigger>
61 |                     <DropdownMenuContent align="end">
62 |                         <DropdownMenuLabel>Actions</DropdownMenuLabel>
63 |                         <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => onEdit(user)}>
64 |                             Edit User
65 |                         </DropdownMenuItem>
66 |                         <DropdownMenuSeparator />
67 |                         <DropdownMenuItem onClick={handleDelete} className="text-red-500 focus:text-red-500">
68 |                             Delete User
69 |                         </DropdownMenuItem>
70 |                     </DropdownMenuContent>
71 |                 </DropdownMenu>
72 |             )
73 |         },
74 |     },
75 | ]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/users/data-table.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1 | "use client"
  2 | 
  3 | import * as React from "react"
  4 | import {
  5 |   ColumnDef,
  6 |   flexRender,
  7 |   getCoreRowModel,
  8 |   useReactTable,
  9 |   getPaginationRowModel,
 10 |   getSortedRowModel,
 11 |   getFilteredRowModel,
 12 |   SortingState,
 13 |   ColumnFiltersState,
 14 | } from "@tanstack/react-table"
 15 | 
 16 | import {
 17 |   Table,
 18 |   TableBody,
 19 |   TableCell,
 20 |   TableHead,
 21 |   TableHeader,
 22 |   TableRow,
 23 | } from "@/components/ui/table"
 24 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
 25 | import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input"
 26 | import { UserFormDialog } from "./user-form-dialog"
 27 | import { getColumns, User } from "./columns"
 28 | import type { roles } from "@/lib/db/schema/tenant"
 29 | 
 30 | interface DataTableProps {
 31 |   data: User[]
 32 |   allRoles: (typeof roles.$inferSelect)[]
 33 | }
 34 | 
 35 | export function DataTable({ data, allRoles }: DataTableProps) {
 36 |   const [isDialogOpen, setIsDialogOpen] = React.useState(false);
 37 |   const [editingUser, setEditingUser] = React.useState<User | null>(null);
 38 |   const [sorting, setSorting] = React.useState<SortingState>([])
 39 |   const [columnFilters, setColumnFilters] = React.useState<ColumnFiltersState>([])
 40 | 
 41 |   const handleEdit = React.useCallback((user: User) => {
 42 |     setEditingUser(user);
 43 |     setIsDialogOpen(true);
 44 |   }, []);
 45 | 
 46 |   const handleCreate = React.useCallback(() => {
 47 |     setEditingUser(null);
 48 |     setIsDialogOpen(true);
 49 |   }, []);
 50 |   
 51 |   const columns = React.useMemo(() => getColumns(handleEdit), [handleEdit]);
 52 | 
 53 |   const table = useReactTable({
 54 |     data,
 55 |     columns,
 56 |     getCoreRowModel: getCoreRowModel(),
 57 |     getPaginationRowModel: getPaginationRowModel(),
 58 |     onSortingChange: setSorting,
 59 |     getSortedRowModel: getSortedRowModel(),
 60 |     onColumnFiltersChange: setColumnFilters,
 61 |     getFilteredRowModel: getFilteredRowModel(),
 62 |     state: {
 63 |         sorting,
 64 |         columnFilters,
 65 |     },
 66 |   })
 67 | 
 68 |   return (
 69 |     <div>
 70 |         <div className="flex items-center justify-between py-4">
 71 |             <Input
 72 |                 placeholder="Filter by email..."
 73 |                 value={(table.getColumn("email")?.getFilterValue() as string) ?? ""}
 74 |                 onChange={(event) =>
 75 |                     table.getColumn("email")?.setFilterValue(event.target.value)
 76 |                 }
 77 |                 className="max-w-sm"
 78 |             />
 79 |             <Button onClick={handleCreate}>Create User</Button>
 80 |         </div>
 81 |         <div className="rounded-md border">
 82 |         <Table>
 83 |             <TableHeader>
 84 |             {table.getHeaderGroups().map((headerGroup) => (
 85 |                 <TableRow key={headerGroup.id}>
 86 |                 {headerGroup.headers.map((header) => (
 87 |                     <TableHead key={header.id}>
 88 |                         {flexRender(header.column.columnDef.header, header.getContext())}
 89 |                     </TableHead>
 90 |                 ))}
 91 |                 </TableRow>
 92 |             ))}
 93 |             </TableHeader>
 94 |             <TableBody>
 95 |             {table.getRowModel().rows?.length ? (
 96 |                 table.getRowModel().rows.map((row) => (
 97 |                 <TableRow key={row.id}>
 98 |                     {row.getVisibleCells().map((cell) => (
 99 |                     <TableCell key={cell.id}>
100 |                         {flexRender(cell.column.columnDef.cell, cell.getContext())}
101 |                     </TableCell>
102 |                     ))}
103 |                 </TableRow>
104 |                 ))
105 |             ) : (
106 |                 <TableRow>
107 |                 <TableCell colSpan={columns.length} className="h-24 text-center">
108 |                     No results.
109 |                 </TableCell>
110 |                 </TableRow>
111 |             )}
112 |             </TableBody>
113 |         </Table>
114 |         </div>
115 |         <div className="flex items-center justify-end space-x-2 py-4">
116 |             <Button
117 |                 variant="outline"
118 |                 size="sm"
119 |                 onClick={() => table.previousPage()}
120 |                 disabled={!table.getCanPreviousPage()}
121 |             >
122 |             Previous
123 |             </Button>
124 |             <Button
125 |                 variant="outline"
126 |                 size="sm"
127 |                 onClick={() => table.nextPage()}
128 |                 disabled={!table.getCanNextPage()}
129 |             >
130 |             Next
131 |             </Button>
132 |       </div>
133 |       <UserFormDialog
134 |         key={editingUser?.id} // Add key to force re-mount and reset form state
135 |         isOpen={isDialogOpen}
136 |         setIsOpen={setIsDialogOpen}
137 |         user={editingUser}
138 |         allRoles={allRoles}
139 |       />
140 |     </div>
141 |   )
142 | }
143 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/users/page.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { getUsersWithRoles } from "@/lib/actions/user";
 2 | import { getRoles } from "@/lib/actions/role";
 3 | import { DataTable } from "./data-table";
 4 | 
 5 | export default async function UsersPage() {
 6 |   const [users, roles] = await Promise.all([
 7 |     getUsersWithRoles(),
 8 |     getRoles(),
 9 |   ]);
10 | 
11 |   return (
12 |     <div className="space-y-4">
13 |         <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">User Management</h1>
14 |         <p className="text-muted-foreground">Create, edit, and manage users in your organization.</p>
15 |         <DataTable data={users} allRoles={roles} />
16 |     </div>
17 |   );
18 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/users/user-form-dialog.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1 | "use client";
  2 | 
  3 | import React from 'react';
  4 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
  5 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
  6 | import {
  7 |   Dialog,
  8 |   DialogContent,
  9 |   DialogHeader,
 10 |   DialogTitle,
 11 |   DialogFooter,
 12 |   DialogDescription,
 13 | } from '@/components/ui/dialog';
 14 | import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
 15 | import { Input } from '@/components/ui/input';
 16 | import { toast } from 'sonner';
 17 | import { MultiSelect } from '@/components/ui/multi-select';
 18 | import { Form, FormControl, FormField, FormItem, FormLabel, FormMessage } from '@/components/ui/form';
 19 | import { UserFormSchema, UserFormInput } from '@/lib/dto/user';
 20 | import { upsertUserAction } from '@/lib/actions/user';
 21 | import type { roles } from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
 22 | import type { User } from './columns';
 23 | 
 24 | interface UserFormDialogProps {
 25 |   isOpen: boolean;
 26 |   setIsOpen: (open: boolean) => void;
 27 |   user: User | null;
 28 |   allRoles: (typeof roles.$inferSelect)[];
 29 | }
 30 | 
 31 | export function UserFormDialog({ isOpen, setIsOpen, user, allRoles }: UserFormDialogProps) {
 32 |   const isEditMode = !!user;
 33 | 
 34 |   const roleOptions = allRoles.map(role => ({
 35 |     value: role.id.toString(),
 36 |     label: role.name,
 37 |   }));
 38 | 
 39 |   const userRoleValues = user ? user.roles.split(', ').filter(Boolean).map(roleName => {
 40 |     const role = allRoles.find(r => r.name === roleName);
 41 |     return role ? role.id.toString() : '';
 42 |   }).filter(Boolean) : [];
 43 | 
 44 |   // Correctly typed useForm hook
 45 |   const form = useForm<UserFormInput>({
 46 |     resolver: zodResolver(UserFormSchema),
 47 |     defaultValues: {
 48 |       id: user?.id,
 49 |       name: user?.name || '',
 50 |       email: user?.email || '',
 51 |       password: '', // Always start with an empty password field
 52 |       roles: userRoleValues,
 53 |     },
 54 |   });
 55 | 
 56 |   const onSubmit = async (values: UserFormInput) => {
 57 |     const dataToSend = { ...values };
 58 |     if (isEditMode && !dataToSend.password) {
 59 |       delete dataToSend.password;
 60 |     }
 61 | 
 62 |     const result = await upsertUserAction(dataToSend);
 63 |     if (result.success) {
 64 |       toast.success(result.message);
 65 |       setIsOpen(false);
 66 |     } else {
 67 |       toast.error(result.message);
 68 |       if (result.errors?.email) {
 69 |         form.setError('email', { type: 'server', message: result.errors.email[0] });
 70 |       }
 71 |     }
 72 |   };
 73 | 
 74 |   return (
 75 |     <Dialog open={isOpen} onOpenChange={setIsOpen}>
 76 |       <DialogContent className="sm:max-w-[425px]">
 77 |         <DialogHeader>
 78 |           <DialogTitle>{isEditMode ? 'Edit User' : 'Create New User'}</DialogTitle>
 79 |           <DialogDescription>
 80 |             {isEditMode ? "Update the user's details below." : "Fill in the details to create a new user."}
 81 |           </DialogDescription>
 82 |         </DialogHeader>
 83 |         <Form {...form}>
 84 |           <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="space-y-4">
 85 |             <FormField
 86 |               control={form.control}
 87 |               name="name"
 88 |               render={({ field }) => (
 89 |                 <FormItem>
 90 |                   <FormLabel>Name</FormLabel>
 91 |                   <FormControl><Input {...field} /></FormControl>
 92 |                   <FormMessage />
 93 |                 </FormItem>
 94 |               )}
 95 |             />
 96 |             <FormField
 97 |               control={form.control}
 98 |               name="email"
 99 |               render={({ field }) => (
100 |                 <FormItem>
101 |                   <FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
102 |                   <FormControl><Input type="email" {...field} /></FormControl>
103 |                   <FormMessage />
104 |                 </FormItem>
105 |               )}
106 |             />
107 |             <FormField
108 |               control={form.control}
109 |               name="password"
110 |               render={({ field }) => (
111 |                 <FormItem>
112 |                   <FormLabel>Password</FormLabel>
113 |                   <FormControl><Input type="password" placeholder={isEditMode ? "Leave blank to keep current" : ""} {...field} /></FormControl>
114 |                   <FormMessage />
115 |                 </FormItem>
116 |               )}
117 |             />
118 |             <FormField
119 |               control={form.control}
120 |               name="roles"
121 |               render={({ field }) => (
122 |                 <FormItem>
123 |                   <FormLabel>Roles</FormLabel>
124 |                    <FormControl>
125 |                       <MultiSelect
126 |                         options={roleOptions}
127 |                         defaultValue={field.value}
128 |                         onValueChange={field.onChange}
129 |                         placeholder="Select roles..."
130 |                       />
131 |                    </FormControl>
132 |                   <FormMessage />
133 |                 </FormItem>
134 |               )}
135 |             />
136 |             <DialogFooter>
137 |               <Button type="submit" disabled={form.formState.isSubmitting}>
138 |                 {form.formState.isSubmitting ? 'Saving...' : isEditMode ? 'Save Changes' : 'Create User'}
139 |               </Button>
140 |             </DialogFooter>
141 |           </form>
142 |         </Form>
143 |       </DialogContent>
144 |     </Dialog>
145 |   );
146 | }
147 |

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/login/page.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | // app/login/page.tsx
 2 | 'use client';
 3 | 
 4 | import { useState } from 'react';
 5 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
 6 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
 7 | import { LoginWithTenantInput, LoginWithTenantDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 8 | 
 9 | export default function LoginPage() {
10 |   const [message, setMessage] = useState('');
11 |   const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm<LoginWithTenantInput>({
12 |     resolver: zodResolver(LoginWithTenantDto),
13 |   });
14 | 
15 |   const onSubmit = async (data: LoginWithTenantInput) => {
16 |     setMessage('');
17 |     try {
18 |       const res = await fetch('/api/auth/login', {
19 |         method: 'POST',
20 |         headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
21 |         body: JSON.stringify(data),
22 |       });
23 | 
24 |       if (res.ok) {
25 |         setMessage('Login successful! Redirecting...');
26 |         window.location.href = `http://${data.tenantId}.localhost:3000/dashboard`;
27 |       } else {
28 |         const result = await res.json();
29 |         setMessage(result.error || 'Login failed');
30 |       }
31 |     } catch (error) {
32 |       setMessage('An unexpected error occurred.');
33 |       console.error('Login request failed:', error);
34 |     }
35 |   };
36 | 
37 |   return (
38 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-900 text-white">
39 |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="bg-gray-800 p-8 rounded-lg shadow-xl w-full max-w-md">
40 |         <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold mb-6 text-center">Login to Your School</h1>
41 |         <div className="mb-4">
42 |           <input {...register('tenantId')} placeholder="School ID (e.g., frisco-high)" className="p-3 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 w-full rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
43 |           {errors.tenantId && <p className="text-red-500 text-sm mt-1">{errors.tenantId.message}</p>}
44 |         </div>
45 |         <div className="mb-4">
46 |           <input {...register('email')} placeholder="Email" className="p-3 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 w-full rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
47 |           {errors.email && <p className="text-red-500 text-sm mt-1">{errors.email.message}</p>}
48 |         </div>
49 |         <div className="mb-6">
50 |           <input type="password" {...register('password')} placeholder="Password" className="p-3 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 w-full rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
51 |           {errors.password && <p className="text-red-500 text-sm mt-1">{errors.password.message}</p>}
52 |         </div>
53 |         <button type="submit" className="bg-blue-600 text-white p-3 w-full rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors">Login</button>
54 |         {message && <p className="mt-4 text-center text-red-400">{message}</p>}
55 |       </form>
56 |     </div>
57 |   );
58 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/page.tsx:

 1 | // app/page.tsx

 4 | export default function HomePage() {

 8 |       <p className="text-xl mb-8">A multi-tenant platform for education management</p>
 9 |       <div className="space-x-4">
10 |         <Link href="/login">
11 |           <button className="bg-blue-500 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-600">Login</button>
12 |         </Link>
13 |         <Link href="/signup">
14 |           <button className="bg-green-500 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded hover:bg-green-600">Signup</button>

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/signup/page.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | 'use client';
 2 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
 3 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
 4 | import { TenantSignupInput, TenantSignupDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 5 | import { useState } from 'react';
 6 | // useRouter was removed as it was unused.
 7 | 
 8 | export default function SignupPage() {
 9 |   const [message, setMessage] = useState('');
10 |   const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm<TenantSignupInput>({
11 |     resolver: zodResolver(TenantSignupDto),
12 |   });
13 | 
14 |   const onSubmit = async (data: TenantSignupInput) => {
15 |     const res = await fetch('/api/tenants', {
16 |       method: 'POST',
17 |       headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
18 |       body: JSON.stringify(data),
19 |     });
20 |     const result = await res.json();
21 |     if (res.ok) {
22 |       setMessage(`Tenant created! Redirecting to your dashboard...`);
23 |       // Redirect to the new tenant's dashboard
24 |       window.location.href = `http://${data.tenantId}.localhost:3000/dashboard`;
25 |     } else {
26 |       setMessage(result.error || 'Error creating tenant');
27 |     }
28 |   };
29 | 
30 |   return (
31 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-800">
32 |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="bg-white p-8 rounded shadow-md w-96">
33 |         <h1 className="text-2xl mb-4">Tenant Signup</h1>
34 |         {/* ... rest of the form ... */}
35 |       </form>
36 |     </div>
37 |   );
38 | }

/components/app-sidebar.tsx:

 1 | import { Sidebar } from "@/components/ui/sidebar";
 2 | import {
 3 |     SidebarContent,
 4 |     SidebarFooter,
 5 |     SidebarHeader,
 6 |     SidebarRail,
 7 | } from "@/components/ui/sidebar";
 8 | 
 9 | import { LucideIcon } from "lucide-react";
10 | import { TeamSwitcher } from "./team-switcher";
11 | import { NavMain } from "@/app/dashboard/nav-main";
12 | import { NavProjects } from "@/app/dashboard/nav-projects";
13 | 
14 | // Define types for the nav data
15 | export interface NavMainItem {
16 |     title: string;
17 |     url: string;
18 |     icon: LucideIcon;
19 |     isActive?: boolean;
20 |     items?: { title: string; url: string }[];
21 | }
22 | 
23 | export interface ProjectItem {
24 |     name: string;
25 |     url: string;
26 |     icon: LucideIcon;
27 | }
28 | 
29 | export interface TeamItem {
30 |     name: string;
31 |     logo: LucideIcon;
32 |     plan: string;
33 | }
34 | 
35 | export interface NavData {
36 |     navMain: NavMainItem[];
37 |     projects: ProjectItem[];
38 |     teams: TeamItem[];
39 | }
40 | 
41 | export interface User {
42 |     name: string;
43 |     email: string;
44 |     avatar: string;
45 | }
46 | 
47 | interface AppSidebarProps extends React.ComponentProps<typeof Sidebar> {
48 |     navData: NavData;
49 |     user: User;
50 | }
51 | 
52 | export function AppSidebar({ navData, user, ...props }: AppSidebarProps) {
53 |     return (
54 |         <Sidebar collapsible="icon" {...props}>
55 |             <SidebarHeader>
56 |                 <TeamSwitcher teams={navData.teams} />
57 |             </SidebarHeader>
58 |             <SidebarContent>
59 |                 <NavMain items={navData.navMain} />
60 |                 <NavProjects projects={navData.projects} />
61 |             </SidebarContent>
62 |             <SidebarFooter>
63 |                 {/* <NavUser user={user} /> */}
64 |                 <p>Nav User</p>
65 |             </SidebarFooter>
66 |             <SidebarRail />
67 |         </Sidebar>
68 |     );
69 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/components/breadcrumbs.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1 | import * as React from "react"
  2 | import { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
  3 | import { ChevronRight, MoreHorizontal } from "lucide-react"
  4 | 
  5 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
  6 | 
  7 | function Breadcrumb({ ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"nav">) {
  8 |   return <nav aria-label="breadcrumb" data-slot="breadcrumb" {...props} />
  9 | }
 10 | 
 11 | function BreadcrumbList({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"ol">) {
 12 |   return (
 13 |     <ol
 14 |       data-slot="breadcrumb-list"
 15 |       className={cn(
 16 |         "text-muted-foreground flex flex-wrap items-center gap-1.5 text-sm break-words sm:gap-2.5",
 17 |         className
 18 |       )}
 19 |       {...props}
 20 |     />
 21 |   )
 22 | }
 23 | 
 24 | function BreadcrumbItem({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"li">) {
 25 |   return (
 26 |     <li
 27 |       data-slot="breadcrumb-item"
 28 |       className={cn("inline-flex items-center gap-1.5", className)}
 29 |       {...props}
 30 |     />
 31 |   )
 32 | }
 33 | 
 34 | function BreadcrumbLink({
 35 |   asChild,
 36 |   className,
 37 |   ...props
 38 | }: React.ComponentProps<"a"> & {
 39 |   asChild?: boolean
 40 | }) {
 41 |   const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "a"
 42 | 
 43 |   return (
 44 |     <Comp
 45 |       data-slot="breadcrumb-link"
 46 |       className={cn("hover:text-foreground transition-colors", className)}
 47 |       {...props}
 48 |     />
 49 |   )
 50 | }
 51 | 
 52 | function BreadcrumbPage({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"span">) {
 53 |   return (
 54 |     <span
 55 |       data-slot="breadcrumb-page"
 56 |       role="link"
 57 |       aria-disabled="true"
 58 |       aria-current="page"
 59 |       className={cn("text-foreground font-normal", className)}
 60 |       {...props}
 61 |     />
 62 |   )
 63 | }
 64 | 
 65 | function BreadcrumbSeparator({
 66 |   children,
 67 |   className,
 68 |   ...props
 69 | }: React.ComponentProps<"li">) {
 70 |   return (
 71 |     <li
 72 |       data-slot="breadcrumb-separator"
 73 |       role="presentation"
 74 |       aria-hidden="true"
 75 |       className={cn("[&>svg]:size-3.5", className)}
 76 |       {...props}
 77 |     >
 78 |       {children ?? <ChevronRight />}
 79 |     </li>
 80 |   )
 81 | }
 82 | 
 83 | function BreadcrumbEllipsis({
 84 |   className,
 85 |   ...props
 86 | }: React.ComponentProps<"span">) {
 87 |   return (
 88 |     <span
 89 |       data-slot="breadcrumb-ellipsis"
 90 |       role="presentation"
 91 |       aria-hidden="true"
 92 |       className={cn("flex size-9 items-center justify-center", className)}
 93 |       {...props}
 94 |     >
 95 |       <MoreHorizontal className="size-4" />
 96 |       <span className="sr-only">More</span>
 97 |     </span>
 98 |   )
 99 | }
100 | 
101 | export {
102 |   Breadcrumb,
103 |   BreadcrumbList,
104 |   BreadcrumbItem,
105 |   BreadcrumbLink,
106 |   BreadcrumbPage,
107 |   BreadcrumbSeparator,
108 |   BreadcrumbEllipsis,
109 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/components/dashboard-header.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | 'use client';
 2 | 
 3 | import Link from 'next/link';
 4 | import { CircleUser, Menu, School } from 'lucide-react';
 5 | import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
 6 | import {
 7 |   DropdownMenu,
 8 |   DropdownMenuContent,
 9 |   DropdownMenuItem,
10 |   DropdownMenuLabel,
11 |   DropdownMenuSeparator,
12 |   DropdownMenuTrigger,
13 | } from '@/components/ui/dropdown-menu';
14 | import { useTenant } from '@/app/dashboard/tenant-provider';
15 | import LogoutButton from './logout-button';
16 | 
17 | 
18 | export default function DashboardHeader() {
19 |   const { user, tenant } = useTenant();
20 | 
21 |   return (
22 |     <header className="sticky top-0 flex h-16 items-center gap-4 border-b bg-background px-4 md:px-6 z-50">
23 |       <nav className="hidden flex-col gap-6 text-lg font-medium md:flex md:flex-row md:items-center md:gap-5 md:text-sm lg:gap-6">
24 |         <Link
25 |           href="#"
26 |           className="flex items-center gap-2 text-lg font-semibold md:text-base"
27 |         >
28 |           <School className="h-6 w-6" />
29 |           <span className="sr-only">{tenant.name}</span>
30 |         </Link>
31 |         <Link
32 |           href="/dashboard"
33 |           className="text-foreground transition-colors hover:text-foreground"
34 |         >
35 |           Dashboard
36 |         </Link>
37 |         <Link
38 |           href="/dashboard/users"
39 |           className="text-muted-foreground transition-colors hover:text-foreground"
40 |         >
41 |           Users
42 |         </Link>
43 |       </nav>
44 |       <div className="flex w-full items-center gap-4 md:ml-auto md:gap-2 lg:gap-4">
45 |         <div className="ml-auto flex-1 sm:flex-initial">
46 |           <h1 className="text-lg font-semibold">{tenant.name}</h1>
47 |         </div>
48 |         <DropdownMenu>
49 |           <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
50 |             <Button variant="secondary" size="icon" className="rounded-full">
51 |               <CircleUser className="h-5 w-5" />
52 |               <span className="sr-only">Toggle user menu</span>
53 |             </Button>
54 |           </DropdownMenuTrigger>
55 |           <DropdownMenuContent align="end">
56 |             <DropdownMenuLabel>{user.name}</DropdownMenuLabel>
57 |             <DropdownMenuSeparator />
58 |             <DropdownMenuItem>Settings</DropdownMenuItem>
59 |             <DropdownMenuSeparator />
60 |             <LogoutButton />
61 |           </DropdownMenuContent>
62 |         </DropdownMenu>
63 |       </div>
64 |     </header>
65 |   );
66 | }

/components/team-switcher.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client"
 2 | 
 3 | import * as React from "react"
 4 | import { ChevronsUpDown, Plus } from "lucide-react"
 5 | 
 6 | import {
 7 |   DropdownMenu,
 8 |   DropdownMenuContent,
 9 |   DropdownMenuItem,
10 |   DropdownMenuLabel,
11 |   DropdownMenuSeparator,
12 |   DropdownMenuShortcut,
13 |   DropdownMenuTrigger,
14 | } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu"
15 | import {
16 |   SidebarMenu,
17 |   SidebarMenuButton,
18 |   SidebarMenuItem,
19 |   useSidebar,
20 | } from "@/components/ui/sidebar"
21 | 
22 | export function TeamSwitcher({
23 |   teams,
24 | }: {
25 |   teams: {
26 |     name: string
27 |     logo: React.ElementType
28 |     plan: string
29 |   }[]
30 | }) {
31 |   const { isMobile } = useSidebar(false)
32 |     const [activeTeam, setActiveTeam] = React.useState(teams[0])
33 | 
34 |   if (!activeTeam) {
35 |     return null
36 |   }
37 | 
38 |   return (
39 |     <SidebarMenu>
40 |       <SidebarMenuItem>
41 |         <DropdownMenu>
42 |           <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
43 |             <SidebarMenuButton
44 |               size="lg"
45 |               className="data-[state=open]:bg-sidebar-accent data-[state=open]:text-sidebar-accent-foreground"
46 |             >
47 |               <div className="bg-sidebar-primary text-sidebar-primary-foreground flex aspect-square size-8 items-center justify-center rounded-lg">
48 |                 <activeTeam.logo className="size-4" />
49 |               </div>
50 |               <div className="grid flex-1 text-left text-sm leading-tight">
51 |                 <span className="truncate font-medium">{activeTeam.name}</span>
52 |                 <span className="truncate text-xs">{activeTeam.plan}</span>
53 |               </div>
54 |               <ChevronsUpDown className="ml-auto" />
55 |             </SidebarMenuButton>
56 |           </DropdownMenuTrigger>
57 |           <DropdownMenuContent
58 |             className="w-(--radix-dropdown-menu-trigger-width) min-w-56 rounded-lg"
59 |             align="start"
60 |             side={isMobile ? "bottom" : "right"}
61 |             sideOffset={4}
62 |           >
63 |             <DropdownMenuLabel className="text-muted-foreground text-xs">
64 |               Teams
65 |             </DropdownMenuLabel>
66 |             {teams.map((team, index) => (
67 |               <DropdownMenuItem
68 |                 key={team.name}
69 |                 onClick={() => setActiveTeam(team)}
70 |                 className="gap-2 p-2"
71 |               >
72 |                 <div className="flex size-6 items-center justify-center rounded-md border">
73 |                   <team.logo className="size-3.5 shrink-0" />
74 |                 </div>
75 |                 {team.name}
76 |                 <DropdownMenuShortcut>âŒ˜{index + 1}</DropdownMenuShortcut>
77 |               </DropdownMenuItem>
78 |             ))}
79 |             <DropdownMenuSeparator />
80 |             <DropdownMenuItem className="gap-2 p-2">
81 |               <div className="flex size-6 items-center justify-center rounded-md border bg-transparent">
82 |                 <Plus className="size-4" />
83 |               </div>
84 |               <div className="text-muted-foreground font-medium">Add team</div>
85 |             </DropdownMenuItem>
86 |           </DropdownMenuContent>
87 |         </DropdownMenu>
88 |       </SidebarMenuItem>
89 |     </SidebarMenu>
90 |   )
91 | }

/components/ui/alert.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import * as React from "react"
 2 | import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
 3 | 
 4 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
 5 | 
 6 | const alertVariants = cva(
 7 |   "relative w-full rounded-lg border px-4 py-3 text-sm grid has-[>svg]:grid-cols-[calc(var(--spacing)*4)_1fr] grid-cols-[0_1fr] has-[>svg]:gap-x-3 gap-y-0.5 items-start [&>svg]:size-4 [&>svg]:translate-y-0.5 [&>svg]:text-current",
 8 |   {
 9 |     variants: {
10 |       variant: {
11 |         default: "bg-card text-card-foreground",
12 |         destructive:
13 |           "text-destructive bg-card [&>svg]:text-current *:data-[slot=alert-description]:text-destructive/90",
14 |       },
15 |     },
16 |     defaultVariants: {
17 |       variant: "default",
18 |     },
19 |   }
20 | )
21 | 
22 | function Alert({
23 |   className,
24 |   variant,
25 |   ...props
26 | }: React.ComponentProps<"div"> & VariantProps<typeof alertVariants>) {
27 |   return (
28 |     <div
29 |       data-slot="alert"
30 |       role="alert"
31 |       className={cn(alertVariants({ variant }), className)}
32 |       {...props}
33 |     />
34 |   )
35 | }
36 | 
37 | function AlertTitle({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"div">) {
38 |   return (
39 |     <div
40 |       data-slot="alert-title"
41 |       className={cn(
42 |         "col-start-2 line-clamp-1 min-h-4 font-medium tracking-tight",
43 |         className
44 |       )}
45 |       {...props}
46 |     />
47 |   )
48 | }
49 | 
50 | function AlertDescription({
51 |   className,
52 |   ...props
53 | }: React.ComponentProps<"div">) {
54 |   return (
55 |     <div
56 |       data-slot="alert-description"
57 |       className={cn(
58 |         "text-muted-foreground col-start-2 grid justify-items-start gap-1 text-sm [&_p]:leading-relaxed",
59 |         className
60 |       )}
61 |       {...props}
62 |     />
63 |   )
64 | }
65 | 
66 | export { Alert, AlertTitle, AlertDescription }
67 |

/components/ui/badge.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import * as React from "react"
 2 | import { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
 3 | import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
 4 | 
 5 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
 6 | 
 7 | const badgeVariants = cva(
 8 |   "inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md border px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium w-fit whitespace-nowrap shrink-0 [&>svg]:size-3 gap-1 [&>svg]:pointer-events-none focus-visible:border-ring focus-visible:ring-ring/50 focus-visible:ring-[3px] aria-invalid:ring-destructive/20 dark:aria-invalid:ring-destructive/40 aria-invalid:border-destructive transition-[color,box-shadow] overflow-hidden",
 9 |   {
10 |     variants: {
11 |       variant: {
12 |         default:
13 |           "border-transparent bg-primary text-primary-foreground [a&]:hover:bg-primary/90",
14 |         secondary:
15 |           "border-transparent bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground [a&]:hover:bg-secondary/90",
16 |         destructive:
17 |           "border-transparent bg-destructive text-white [a&]:hover:bg-destructive/90 focus-visible:ring-destructive/20 dark:focus-visible:ring-destructive/40 dark:bg-destructive/60",
18 |         outline:
19 |           "text-foreground [a&]:hover:bg-accent [a&]:hover:text-accent-foreground",
20 |       },
21 |     },
22 |     defaultVariants: {
23 |       variant: "default",
24 |     },
25 |   }
26 | )
27 | 
28 | function Badge({
29 |   className,
30 |   variant,
31 |   asChild = false,
32 |   ...props
33 | }: React.ComponentProps<"span"> &
34 |   VariantProps<typeof badgeVariants> & { asChild?: boolean }) {
35 |   const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "span"
36 | 
37 |   return (
38 |     <Comp
39 |       data-slot="badge"
40 |       className={cn(badgeVariants({ variant }), className)}
41 |       {...props}
42 |     />
43 |   )
44 | }
45 | 
46 | export { Badge, badgeVariants }
47 |

/components/ui/button.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import * as React from "react"
 2 | import { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
 3 | import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
 4 | 
 5 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
 6 | 
 7 | const buttonVariants = cva(
 8 |   "inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-all disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg:not([class*='size-'])]:size-4 shrink-0 [&_svg]:shrink-0 outline-none focus-visible:border-ring focus-visible:ring-ring/50 focus-visible:ring-[3px] aria-invalid:ring-destructive/20 dark:aria-invalid:ring-destructive/40 aria-invalid:border-destructive",
 9 |   {
10 |     variants: {
11 |       variant: {
12 |         default:
13 |           "bg-primary text-primary-foreground shadow-xs hover:bg-primary/90",
14 |         destructive:
15 |           "bg-destructive text-white shadow-xs hover:bg-destructive/90 focus-visible:ring-destructive/20 dark:focus-visible:ring-destructive/40 dark:bg-destructive/60",
16 |         outline:
17 |           "border bg-background shadow-xs hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground dark:bg-input/30 dark:border-input dark:hover:bg-input/50",
18 |         secondary:
19 |           "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground shadow-xs hover:bg-secondary/80",
20 |         ghost:
21 |           "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground dark:hover:bg-accent/50",
22 |         link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline",
23 |       },
24 |       size: {
25 |         default: "h-9 px-4 py-2 has-[>svg]:px-3",
26 |         sm: "h-8 rounded-md gap-1.5 px-3 has-[>svg]:px-2.5",
27 |         lg: "h-10 rounded-md px-6 has-[>svg]:px-4",
28 |         icon: "size-9",
29 |       },
30 |     },
31 |     defaultVariants: {
32 |       variant: "default",
33 |       size: "default",
34 |     },
35 |   }
36 | )
37 | 
38 | function Button({
39 |   className,
40 |   variant,
41 |   size,
42 |   asChild = false,
43 |   ...props
44 | }: React.ComponentProps<"button"> &
45 |   VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants> & {
46 |     asChild?: boolean
47 |   }) {
48 |   const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "button"
49 | 
50 |   return (
51 |     <Comp
52 |       data-slot="button"
53 |       className={cn(buttonVariants({ variant, size, className }))}
54 |       {...props}
55 |     />
56 |   )
57 | }
58 | 
59 | export { Button, buttonVariants }
60 |

  1 | "use client"
  2 | 
  3 | import * as React from "react"
  4 | import { Command as CommandPrimitive } from "cmdk"
  5 | import { SearchIcon } from "lucide-react"
  6 | 
  7 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
  8 | import {
  9 |   Dialog,
 10 |   DialogContent,
 11 |   DialogDescription,
 12 |   DialogHeader,
 13 |   DialogTitle,
 14 | } from "@/components/ui/dialog"
 15 | 
 16 | function Command({
 17 |   className,
 18 |   ...props
 19 | }: React.ComponentProps<typeof CommandPrimitive>) {
 20 |   return (
 21 |     <CommandPrimitive
 22 |       data-slot="command"
 23 |       className={cn(
 24 |         "bg-popover text-popover-foreground flex h-full w-full flex-col overflow-hidden rounded-md",
 25 |         className
 26 |       )}
 27 |       {...props}
 28 |     />
 29 |   )
 30 | }
 31 | 
 32 | function CommandDialog({
 33 |   title = "Command Palette",
 34 |   description = "Search for a command to run...",
 35 |   children,
 36 |   className,
 37 |   showCloseButton = true,
 38 |   ...props
 39 | }: React.ComponentProps<typeof Dialog> & {
 40 |   title?: string
 41 |   description?: string
 42 |   className?: string
 43 |   showCloseButton?: boolean
 44 | }) {
 45 |   return (
 46 |     <Dialog {...props}>
 47 |       <DialogHeader className="sr-only">
 48 |         <DialogTitle>{title}</DialogTitle>
 49 |         <DialogDescription>{description}</DialogDescription>
 50 |       </DialogHeader>
 51 |       <DialogContent
 52 |         className={cn("overflow-hidden p-0", className)}
 53 |         showCloseButton={showCloseButton}
 54 |       >
 55 |         <Command className="[&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:text-muted-foreground **:data-[slot=command-input-wrapper]:h-12 [&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:px-2 [&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:font-medium [&_[cmdk-group]]:px-2 [&_[cmdk-group]:not([hidden])_~[cmdk-group]]:pt-0 [&_[cmdk-input-wrapper]_svg]:h-5 [&_[cmdk-input-wrapper]_svg]:w-5 [&_[cmdk-input]]:h-12 [&_[cmdk-item]]:px-2 [&_[cmdk-item]]:py-3 [&_[cmdk-item]_svg]:h-5 [&_[cmdk-item]_svg]:w-5">
 56 |           {children}
 57 |         </Command>
 58 |       </DialogContent>
 59 |     </Dialog>
 60 |   )
 61 | }
 62 |

 64 |   className,
 65 |   ...props
 66 | }: React.ComponentProps<typeof CommandPrimitive.Input>) {

 78 |         )}
 79 |         {...props}
 80 |       />
 81 |     </div>
 82 |   )
 83 | }

140 | }

142 | function CommandItem({
143 |   className,
144 |   ...props
145 | }: React.ComponentProps<typeof CommandPrimitive.Item>) {
146 |   return (
147 |     <CommandPrimitive.Item
148 |       data-slot="command-item"
149 |       className={cn(
150 |         "data-[selected=true]:bg-accent data-[selected=true]:text-accent-foreground [&_svg:not([class*='text-'])]:text-muted-foreground relative flex cursor-default items-center gap-2 rounded-sm px-2 py-1.5 text-sm outline-hidden select-none data-[disabled=true]:pointer-events-none data-[disabled=true]:opacity-50 [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg]:shrink-0 [&_svg:not([class*='size-'])]:size-4",
151 |         className
152 |       )}
153 |       {...props}
154 |     />
155 |   )
156 | }
157 | 
158 | function CommandShortcut({
159 |   className,
160 |   ...props

/components/ui/dialog.tsx:

  1 | "use client"
  2 | 
  3 | import * as React from "react"
  4 | import * as DialogPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-dialog"
  5 | import { XIcon } from "lucide-react"
  6 | 
  7 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
  8 | 
  9 | function Dialog({
 10 |   ...props
 11 | }: React.ComponentProps<typeof DialogPrimitive.Root>) {
 12 |   return <DialogPrimitive.Root data-slot="dialog" {...props} />
 13 | }
 14 | 
 15 | function DialogTrigger({
 16 |   ...props
 17 | }: React.ComponentProps<typeof DialogPrimitive.Trigger>) {
 18 |   return <DialogPrimitive.Trigger data-slot="dialog-trigger" {...props} />
 19 | }
 20 | 
 21 | function DialogPortal({
 22 |   ...props
 23 | }: React.ComponentProps<typeof DialogPrimitive.Portal>) {
 24 |   return <DialogPrimitive.Portal data-slot="dialog-portal" {...props} />
 25 | }
 26 | 
 27 | function DialogClose({
 28 |   ...props
 29 | }: React.ComponentProps<typeof DialogPrimitive.Close>) {
 30 |   return <DialogPrimitive.Close data-slot="dialog-close" {...props} />
 31 | }
 32 | 
 33 | function DialogOverlay({
 34 |   className,
 35 |   ...props
 36 | }: React.ComponentProps<typeof DialogPrimitive.Overlay>) {
 37 |   return (
 38 |     <DialogPrimitive.Overlay
 39 |       data-slot="dialog-overlay"
 40 |       className={cn(
 41 |         "data-[state=open]:animate-in data-[state=closed]:animate-out data-[state=closed]:fade-out-0 data-[state=open]:fade-in-0 fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-black/50",
 42 |         className
 43 |       )}
 44 |       {...props}
 45 |     />
 46 |   )
 47 | }
 48 | 
 49 | function DialogContent({
 50 |   className,
 51 |   children,
 52 |   showCloseButton = true,
 53 |   ...props
 54 | }: React.ComponentProps<typeof DialogPrimitive.Content> & {
 55 |   showCloseButton?: boolean
 56 | }) {
 57 |   return (
 58 |     <DialogPortal data-slot="dialog-portal">
 59 |       <DialogOverlay />
 60 |       <DialogPrimitive.Content
 61 |         data-slot="dialog-content"
 62 |         className={cn(
 63 |           "bg-background data-[state=open]:animate-in data-[state=closed]:animate-out data-[state=closed]:fade-out-0 data-[state=open]:fade-in-0 data-[state=closed]:zoom-out-95 data-[state=open]:zoom-in-95 fixed top-[50%] left-[50%] z-50 grid w-full max-w-[calc(100%-2rem)] translate-x-[-50%] translate-y-[-50%] gap-4 rounded-lg border p-6 shadow-lg duration-200 sm:max-w-lg",
 64 |           className
 65 |         )}
 66 |         {...props}
 67 |       >
 68 |         {children}
 69 |         {showCloseButton && (
 70 |           <DialogPrimitive.Close
 71 |             data-slot="dialog-close"
 72 |             className="ring-offset-background focus:ring-ring data-[state=open]:bg-accent data-[state=open]:text-muted-foreground absolute top-4 right-4 rounded-xs opacity-70 transition-opacity hover:opacity-100 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:outline-hidden disabled:pointer-events-none [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg]:shrink-0 [&_svg:not([class*='size-'])]:size-4"
 73 |           >
 74 |             <XIcon />
 75 |             <span className="sr-only">Close</span>
 76 |           </DialogPrimitive.Close>
 77 |         )}
 78 |       </DialogPrimitive.Content>
 79 |     </DialogPortal>
 80 |   )
 81 | }
 82 | 
 83 | function DialogHeader({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"div">) {
 84 |   return (
 85 |     <div
 86 |       data-slot="dialog-header"
 87 |       className={cn("flex flex-col gap-2 text-center sm:text-left", className)}
 88 |       {...props}
 89 |     />
 90 |   )
 91 | }
 92 | 
 93 | function DialogFooter({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"div">) {
 94 |   return (
 95 |     <div
 96 |       data-slot="dialog-footer"
 97 |       className={cn(
 98 |         "flex flex-col-reverse gap-2 sm:flex-row sm:justify-end",
 99 |         className
100 |       )}
101 |       {...props}
102 |     />
103 |   )
104 | }
105 | 
106 | function DialogTitle({
107 |   className,
108 |   ...props
109 | }: React.ComponentProps<typeof DialogPrimitive.Title>) {
110 |   return (
111 |     <DialogPrimitive.Title
112 |       data-slot="dialog-title"
113 |       className={cn("text-lg leading-none font-semibold", className)}
114 |       {...props}
115 |     />
116 |   )
117 | }
118 | 
119 | function DialogDescription({
120 |   className,
121 |   ...props
122 | }: React.ComponentProps<typeof DialogPrimitive.Description>) {
123 |   return (
124 |     <DialogPrimitive.Description
125 |       data-slot="dialog-description"
126 |       className={cn("text-muted-foreground text-sm", className)}
127 |       {...props}
128 |     />
129 |   )
130 | }
131 | 
132 | export {
133 |   Dialog,
134 |   DialogClose,
135 |   DialogContent,
136 |   DialogDescription,
137 |   DialogFooter,
138 |   DialogHeader,
139 |   DialogOverlay,
140 |   DialogPortal,
141 |   DialogTitle,
142 |   DialogTrigger,
143 | }
144 |
