 1399 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1400 | /lib/neon/api.ts:
 1401 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1402 |  1 | // In lib/neon/api.ts
 1403 |  2 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 1404 |  3 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
 1405 |  4 | 
 1406 |  5 | const NEON_API_BASE = 'https://console.neon.tech/api/v2';
 1407 |  6 | 
 1408 |  7 | export async function createNeonProject(tenantId: string) {
 1409 |  8 |   log.info({ tenantId }, '[NeonAPI] Starting project creation process.');
 1410 |  9 | 
 1411 | 10 |   const headers = {
 1412 | 11 |     'Authorization': `Bearer ${env.NEON_API_KEY}`,
 1413 | 12 |     'Content-Type': 'application/json',
 1414 | 13 |     'Accept': 'application/json',
 1415 | 14 |   };
 1416 | 15 | 
 1417 | 16 |   const projectResponse = await fetch(`${NEON_API_BASE}/projects`, {
 1418 | 17 |     method: 'POST',
 1419 | 18 |     headers,
 1420 | 19 |     body: JSON.stringify({
 1421 | 20 |       project: { name: `edux-tenant-${tenantId}` },
 1422 | 21 |     }),
 1423 | 22 |   });
 1424 | 23 | 
 1425 | 24 |   if (!projectResponse.ok) {
 1426 | 25 |     const errorBody = await projectResponse.text();
 1427 | 26 |     log.error({ tenantId, status: projectResponse.status, errorBody }, '[NeonAPI] Failed to create project.');
 1428 | 27 |     throw new Error(`Failed to create Neon project: ${errorBody}`);
 1429 | 28 |   }
 1430 | 29 | 
 1431 | 30 |   const responseData = await projectResponse.json();
 1432 | 31 |   const project = responseData.project;
 1433 | 32 |   const connectionDetails = responseData.connection_uris?.[0];
 1434 | 33 |   const connection_uri = connectionDetails?.connection_uri;
 1435 | 34 | 
 1436 | 35 |   if (!connection_uri) {
 1437 | 36 |     log.error({ responseData }, '[NeonAPI] Connection URI could not be extracted from the response.');
 1438 | 37 |     throw new Error('Connection URI could not be extracted from the Neon API response.');
 1439 | 38 |   }
 1440 | 39 | 
 1441 | 40 |   log.info({ tenantId, projectId: project.id }, '[NeonAPI] Project created successfully.');
 1442 | 41 | 
 1443 | 42 |   // The modification to create a pooled string has been removed.
 1444 | 43 |   // We will now return the original, direct connection string.
 1445 | 44 | 
 1446 | 45 |   return {
 1447 | 46 |     projectId: project.id,
 1448 | 47 |     connectionString: connection_uri,
 1449 | 48 |   };
 1450 | 49 | }

 1456 |  1 | // lib/server/tenant.ts
 1457 |  2 | import { mainDb } from '@/lib/db';
 1458 |  3 | import { tenants } from '@/lib/db/schema/shared';
 1459 |  4 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
 1460 |  5 | 
 1461 |  6 | export async function validateTenant(tenantId: string) {
 1462 |  7 |   console.log(`[Tenant] Validating tenant: ${tenantId}`);
 1463 |  8 |   const results = await mainDb.select().from(tenants).where(eq(tenants.tenantId, tenantId)).limit(1);
 1464 |  9 |   const tenant = results[0];
 1465 | 10 | 
 1466 | 11 |   if (!tenant) {
 1467 | 12 |     console.error(`[Tenant] Invalid tenant: ${tenantId}`);
 1468 | 13 |     throw new Error('Tenant not found');
 1469 | 14 |   }
 1470 | 15 | 
 1471 | 16 |   return tenant;
 1472 | 17 | }

 1481 | 4 | export function cn(...inputs: ClassValue[]) {

 1486 | 
 1487 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1488 | /middleware.ts:
 1489 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1490 |  1 | // middleware.ts
 1491 |  2 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
 1492 |  3 | import logger from './lib/logger';
 1493 |  4 | 
 1494 |  5 | // Extracts the tenant ID from the hostname.
 1495 |  6 | const getTenantId = (host: string): string | null => {
 1496 |  7 |   const parts = host.split('.');
 1497 |  8 | 
 1498 |  9 |   // Handles tenant.localhost:3000 in development
 1499 | 10 |   if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' && parts.length === 2 && parts[1].startsWith('localhost')) {
 1500 | 11 |     return parts[0];
 1501 | 12 |   }
 1502 | 13 | 
 1503 | 14 |   // Handles tenant.example.com in production
 1504 | 15 |   if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' && parts.length > 1 && parts[0] !== 'www') {
 1505 | 16 |     return parts[0];
 1506 | 17 |   }
 1507 | 18 | 
 1508 | 19 |   return null;
 1509 | 20 | };
 1510 | 21 | 
 1511 | 22 | 
 1512 | 23 | export function middleware(request: NextRequest) {
 1513 | 24 |   const host = request.headers.get('host') || '';
 1514 | 25 |   const tenantId = getTenantId(host);
 1515 | 26 |   const { pathname } = request.nextUrl;
 1516 | 27 |   const log = logger.child({ tenantId, pathname });
 1517 | 28 | 
 1518 | 29 |   log.info('Middleware processing request');
 1519 | 30 | 
 1520 | 31 |   const headers = new Headers(request.headers);
 1521 | 32 |   if (tenantId) {
 1522 | 33 |     headers.set('x-tenant-id', tenantId);
 1523 | 34 |   }
 1524 | 35 | 
 1525 | 36 |   // Allow public routes regardless of tenant.
 1526 | 37 |   if (pathname === '/' || pathname === '/signup') {
 1527 | 38 |     return NextResponse.next({ request: { headers } });
 1528 | 39 |   }
 1529 | 40 | 
 1530 | 41 |   // If on a tenant subdomain, allow access to login.
 1531 | 42 |   if (tenantId && pathname.startsWith('/login')) {
 1532 | 43 |       return NextResponse.next({ request: { headers } });
 1533 | 44 |   }
 1534 | 45 | 
 1535 | 46 |   // All API routes are allowed to pass through for now;
 1536 | 47 |   // authentication will be handled at the route level.
 1537 | 48 |   if (pathname.startsWith('/api')) {
 1538 | 49 |     return NextResponse.next({ request: { headers } });
 1539 | 50 |   }
 1540 | 51 | 
 1541 | 52 |   // For dashboard access, check for an auth token.
 1542 | 53 |   const token = request.cookies.get('authToken');
 1543 | 54 |   if (pathname.startsWith('/dashboard') && !token) {
 1544 | 55 |     log.warn('Access to dashboard denied without token, redirecting to login.');
 1545 | 56 |     const loginUrl = new URL('/login', request.url);
 1546 | 57 |     return NextResponse.redirect(loginUrl);
 1547 | 58 |   }
 1548 | 59 | 
 1549 | 60 |   return NextResponse.next({ request: { headers } });
 1550 | 61 | }
 1551 | 62 | 
 1552 | 63 | export const config = {
 1553 | 64 |   matcher: [
 1554 | 65 |     /*
 1555 | 66 |      * Match all request paths except for the ones starting with:
 1556 | 67 |      * - _next/static (static files)
 1557 | 68 |      * - _next/image (image optimization files)
 1558 | 69 |      * - favicon.ico (favicon file)
 1559 | 70 |      */
 1560 | 71 |     '/((?!_next/static|_next/image|favicon.ico).*)',
 1561 | 72 |   ],
 1562 | 73 | };
 1563 |

 1569 | 2 | const nextConfig = {
 1570 | 3 |   reactStrictMode: true,
 1571 | 4 |   transpilePackages: ['geist'], // Required for Geist font to work correctly
 1572 | 5 | };
 1573 | 6 | 
 1574 | 7 | export default nextConfig;

10046 |  101 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10047 |  102 | /README.md:
10048 |  103 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10049 |  104 | 1 | <!-- run psgl inside docker container -->
10050 |  105 | 2 | docker exec -it eduspace-postgres psql -U eduspace_user -d eduspace_db
10051 |  106 | 3 | 
10052 |  107 | 
10053 |  108 | 
10054 |  109 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10055 |  110 | /app/api/auth/login/route.ts:
10056 |  111 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10057 |  112 |  1 | // app/api/auth/login/route.ts
10058 |  113 |  2 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
10059 |  114 |  3 | import { getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
10060 |  115 |  4 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
10061 |  116 |  5 | import bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
10062 |  117 |  6 | import jwt from 'jsonwebtoken';
10063 |  118 |  7 | import { LoginDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
10064 |  119 |  8 | import { validateTenant } from '@/lib/server/tenant';
10065 |  120 |  9 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
10066 |  121 | 10 | 
10067 |  122 | 11 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';
10068 |  123 | 12 | 
10069 |  124 | 13 | export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
10070 |  125 | 14 |   try {
10071 |  126 | 15 |     const tenantId = request.headers.get('x-tenant-id');
10072 |  127 | 16 |     if (!tenantId) {
10073 |  128 | 17 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Tenant required' }, { status: 400 });
10074 |  129 | 18 |     }
10075 |  130 | 19 | 
10076 |  131 | 20 |     // Validate tenant existence
10077 |  132 | 21 |     await validateTenant(tenantId);
10078 |  133 | 22 | 
10079 |  134 | 23 |     const body = await request.json();
10080 |  135 | 24 |     const data = LoginDto.parse(body);
10081 |  136 | 25 | 
10082 |  137 | 26 |     console.log(`[API] Login attempt for tenant: ${tenantId}, email: ${data.email}`);
10083 |  138 | 27 | 
10084 |  139 | 28 |     const { db: tenantDb, schema } = await getTenantDb(tenantId);
10085 |  140 | 29 |     const users = await tenantDb.select().from(schema.users).where(eq(schema.users.email, data.email)).limit(1);
10086 |  141 | 30 | 
10087 |  142 | 31 |     if (!users.length) {
10088 |  143 | 32 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid credentials' }, { status: 401 });
10089 |  144 | 33 |     }
10090 |  145 | 34 | 
10091 |  146 | 35 |     const user = users[0];
10092 |  147 | 36 |     const match = await bcrypt.compare(data.password, user.password);
10093 |  148 | 37 |     if (!match) {
10094 |  149 | 38 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid credentials' }, { status: 401 });
10095 |  150 | 39 |     }
10096 |  151 | 40 | 
10097 |  152 | 41 |     const token = jwt.sign({ tenantId, userId: user.id }, env.JWT_SECRET, { expiresIn: '1h' });
10098 |  153 | 42 | 
10099 |  154 | 43 |     const response = NextResponse.json({ message: 'Login successful' });
10100 |  155 | 44 |     response.cookies.set('authToken', token, { httpOnly: true, secure: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production', sameSite: 'strict', maxAge: 3600 });
10101 |  156 | 45 |     return response;
10102 |  157 | 46 |   } catch (err) {
10103 |  158 | 47 |     console.error('[API] Login failed:', err);
10104 |  159 | 48 |     if (err instanceof Error && err.message === 'Tenant not found') {
10105 |  160 | 49 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Tenant not found' }, { status: 404 });
10106 |  161 | 50 |     }
10107 |  162 | 51 |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal error' }, { status: 500 });
10108 |  163 | 52 |   }
10109 |  164 | 53 | }
10110 |  165 | 
10111 |  166 | 
10112 |  167 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10113 |  168 | /app/api/tenants/route.ts:
10114 |  169 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10115 |  170 |  1 | // app/api/tenants/route.ts
10116 |  171 |  2 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
10117 |  172 |  3 | import { sharedDb, getTenantDb, executeRawQuery } from '@/lib/db';
10118 |  173 |  4 | import { tenants } from '@/lib/db/schema/shared';
10119 |  174 |  5 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
10120 |  175 |  6 | import bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
10121 |  176 |  7 | import { TenantSignupDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
10122 |  177 |  8 | import z from 'zod/v4';
10123 |  178 |  9 | 
10124 |  179 | 10 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';
10125 |  180 | 11 | 
10126 |  181 | 12 | export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
10127 |  182 | 13 |   try {
10128 |  183 | 14 |     const body = await request.json();
10129 |  184 | 15 |     const data = TenantSignupDto.parse(body);
10130 |  185 | 16 |     const tenantId = data.tenantId; 
10131 |  186 | 17 |     const schemaName = `tenant_${tenantId}`;
10132 |  187 | 18 | 
10133 |  188 | 19 |     console.log(`[API] Creating tenant: ${tenantId}, schema: ${schemaName}`);
10134 |  189 | 20 | 
10135 |  190 | 21 |     const existing = await sharedDb.select().from(tenants).where(eq(tenants.tenantId, tenantId));
10136 |  191 | 22 |     if (existing.length) {
10137 |  192 | 23 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Tenant ID already exists' }, { status: 409 });
10138 |  193 | 24 |     }
10139 |  194 | 25 | 
10140 |  195 | 26 |     // Create schema and users table
10141 |  196 | 27 |     await executeRawQuery(`CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS "${schemaName}";`);
10142 |  197 | 28 |     await executeRawQuery(`
10143 |  198 | 29 |       CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "${schemaName}".users (
10144 |  199 | 30 |         id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
10145 |  200 | 31 |         name TEXT NOT NULL,
10146 |  201 | 32 |         email TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
10147 |  202 | 33 |         password TEXT NOT NULL
10148 |  203 | 34 |       );
10149 |  204 | 35 |     `);
10150 |  205 | 36 | 
10151 |  206 | 37 |     // Insert tenant metadata
10152 |  207 | 38 |     await sharedDb.insert(tenants).values({
10153 |  208 | 39 |       tenantId,
10154 |  209 | 40 |       schemaName,
10155 |  210 | 41 |       name: data.orgName,
10156 |  211 | 42 |     });
10157 |  212 | 43 | 
10158 |  213 | 44 |     // Insert admin user
10159 |  214 | 45 |     const { db: tenantDb, schema } = await getTenantDb(tenantId);
10160 |  215 | 46 |     const hashedPassword = await bcrypt.hash(data.adminPassword, 12);  // Stronger salt (12 rounds)
10161 |  216 | 47 |     await tenantDb.insert(schema.users).values({
10162 |  217 | 48 |       name: data.adminName,
10163 |  218 | 49 |       email: data.adminEmail,
10164 |  219 | 50 |       password: hashedPassword,
10165 |  220 | 51 |     });
10166 |  221 | 52 | 
10167 |  222 | 53 |     console.log(`[API] Tenant created successfully: ${tenantId}`);
10168 |  223 | 54 |     return NextResponse.json({ message: 'Tenant created', tenantId });
10169 |  224 | 55 |   } catch (err) {
10170 |  225 | 56 |     console.error('[API] Tenant creation failed:', err);
10171 |  226 | 57 |     if (err instanceof z.ZodError) {
10172 |  227 | 58 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: err }, { status: 400 });
10173 |  228 | 59 |     }
10174 |  229 | 60 |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal error' }, { status: 500 });
10175 |  230 | 61 |   }
10176 |  231 | 62 | }
10177 |  232 | 
10178 |  233 | 
10179 |  234 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10180 |  235 | /app/dashboard/page.tsx:
10181 |  236 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10182 |  237 |  1 | // app/dashboard/page.tsx
10183 |  238 |  2 | import { cookies } from 'next/headers';
10184 |  239 |  3 | import { verify } from 'jsonwebtoken';
10185 |  240 |  4 | import { getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
10186 |  241 |  5 | 
10187 |  242 |  6 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
10188 |  243 |  7 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
10189 |  244 |  8 | 
10190 |  245 |  9 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';  // Node runtime
10191 |  246 | 10 | 
10192 |  247 | 11 | export default async function DashboardPage() {
10193 |  248 | 12 |   const cookieStore = cookies();
10194 |  249 | 13 |   const token = (await cookieStore).get('authToken')?.value;
10195 |  250 | 14 |   if (!token) {
10196 |  251 | 15 |     return <div>Unauthorized</div>;
10197 |  252 | 16 |   }
10198 |  253 | 17 | 
10199 |  254 | 18 |   let decoded;
10200 |  255 | 19 |   try {
10201 |  256 | 20 |     decoded = verify(token, env.JWT_SECRET) as { tenantId: string; userId: number };
10202 |  257 | 21 | 
10203 |  258 | 22 |     const { db: tenantDb, schema } = await getTenantDb(decoded.tenantId);
10204 |  259 | 23 |     const user = await tenantDb.select().from(schema.users).where(eq(schema.users.id, decoded.userId)).limit(1);
10205 |  260 | 24 | 
10206 |  261 | 25 |     return (
10207 |  262 | 26 |       <div className="min-h-screen p-8 bg-gray-100">
10208 |  263 | 27 |         <h1 className="text-3xl">Welcome to {decoded.tenantId} Dashboard</h1>
10209 |  264 | 28 |         <p>Email: {user[0]?.email}</p>
10210 |  265 | 29 |       </div>
10211 |  266 | 30 |     );
10212 |  267 | 31 |   } catch (err) {
10213 |  268 | 32 |     if (err === 'Tenant not found') {
10214 |  269 | 33 |       return <div>Tenant not found</div>;
10215 |  270 | 34 |     }
10216 |  271 | 35 |     return <div>Invalid token</div>;
10217 |  272 | 36 |   }
10218 |  273 | 37 | }
10219 |  274 | 
10220 |  275 |

10395 |  450 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10396 |  451 | /app/login/page.tsx:
10397 |  452 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10398 |  453 |  1 | // app/login/page.tsx
10399 |  454 |  2 | 'use client';
10400 |  455 |  3 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
10401 |  456 |  4 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
10402 |  457 |  5 | import { LoginInput, LoginDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
10403 |  458 |  6 | import { useState } from 'react';
10404 |  459 |  7 | import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';
10405 |  460 |  8 | 
10406 |  461 |  9 | export default function LoginPage() {
10407 |  462 | 10 |   const [message, setMessage] = useState('');
10408 |  463 | 11 |   const router = useRouter();
10409 |  464 | 12 |   const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm<LoginInput>({
10410 |  465 | 13 |     resolver: zodResolver(LoginDto),
10411 |  466 | 14 |   });
10412 |  467 | 15 | 
10413 |  468 | 16 |   const onSubmit = async (data: LoginInput) => {
10414 |  469 | 17 |     const res = await fetch('/api/auth/login', {
10415 |  470 | 18 |       method: 'POST',
10416 |  471 | 19 |       headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
10417 |  472 | 20 |       body: JSON.stringify(data),
10418 |  473 | 21 |     });
10419 |  474 | 22 |     if (res.ok) {
10420 |  475 | 23 |       router.push('/dashboard');
10421 |  476 | 24 |     } else {
10422 |  477 | 25 |       const result = await res.json();
10423 |  478 | 26 |       setMessage(result.error || 'Login failed');
10424 |  479 | 27 |     }
10425 |  480 | 28 |   };
10426 |  481 | 29 | 
10427 |  482 | 30 |   return (
10428 |  483 | 31 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-800">
10429 |  484 | 32 |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="bg-green p-8 rounded shadow-md w-96">
10430 |  485 | 33 |         <h1 className="text-2xl mb-4">Login</h1>
10431 |  486 | 34 |         <input {...register('email')} placeholder="Email" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
10432 |  487 | 35 |         {errors.email && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.email.message}</p>}
10433 |  488 | 36 |         <input type="password" {...register('password')} placeholder="Password" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
10434 |  489 | 37 |         {errors.password && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.password.message}</p>}
10435 |  490 | 38 |         <button type="submit" className="bg-blue-500 text-white p-2 w-full">Login</button>
10436 |  491 | 39 |         <p className="mt-2">{message}</p>
10437 |  492 | 40 |       </form>
10438 |  493 | 41 |     </div>
10439 |  494 | 42 |   );
10440 |  495 | 43 | }
10441 |  496 |

10465 |  520 | 
10466 |  521 | 
10467 |  522 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10468 |  523 | /app/signup/page.tsx:
10469 |  524 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10470 |  525 |  1 | // app/signup/page.tsx
10471 |  526 |  2 | 'use client';
10472 |  527 |  3 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
10473 |  528 |  4 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
10474 |  529 |  5 | import { TenantSignupInput, TenantSignupDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
10475 |  530 |  6 | import { useState } from 'react';
10476 |  531 |  7 | import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';
10477 |  532 |  8 | 
10478 |  533 |  9 | export default function SignupPage() {
10479 |  534 | 10 |   const [message, setMessage] = useState('');
10480 |  535 | 11 |   const router = useRouter();
10481 |  536 | 12 |   const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm<TenantSignupInput>({
10482 |  537 | 13 |     resolver: zodResolver(TenantSignupDto),
10483 |  538 | 14 |   });
10484 |  539 | 15 | 
10485 |  540 | 16 |   const onSubmit = async (data: TenantSignupInput) => {
10486 |  541 | 17 |     const res = await fetch('/api/tenants', {
10487 |  542 | 18 |       method: 'POST',
10488 |  543 | 19 |       headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
10489 |  544 | 20 |       body: JSON.stringify(data),
10490 |  545 | 21 |     });
10491 |  546 | 22 |     const result = await res.json();
10492 |  547 | 23 |     if (res.ok) {
10493 |  548 | 24 |       setMessage(`Tenant created! Redirecting to dashboard...`);
10494 |  549 | 25 |       // Redirect to tenant dashboard (add to /etc/hosts first)
10495 |  550 | 26 |       window.location.href = `http://${data.tenantId}.localhost:3000/dashboard`;
10496 |  551 | 27 |     } else {
10497 |  552 | 28 |       setMessage(result.error || 'Error creating tenant');
10498 |  553 | 29 |     }
10499 |  554 | 30 |   };
10500 |  555 | 31 | 
10501 |  556 | 32 |   return (
10502 |  557 | 33 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-800">
10503 |  558 | 34 |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="bg-white p-8 rounded shadow-md w-96">
10504 |  559 | 35 |         <h1 className="text-2xl mb-4">Tenant Signup</h1>
10505 |  560 | 36 |         <input {...register('orgName')} placeholder="Organization Name" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
10506 |  561 | 37 |         {errors.orgName && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.orgName.message}</p>}
10507 |  562 | 38 |         <input {...register('tenantId')} placeholder="Tenant ID (e.g., plano-isd)" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
10508 |  563 | 39 |         {errors.tenantId && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.tenantId.message}</p>}
10509 |  564 | 40 |         <input {...register('adminName')} placeholder="Admin Name" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
10510 |  565 | 41 |         {errors.adminName && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.adminName.message}</p>}
10511 |  566 | 42 |         <input {...register('adminEmail')} placeholder="Admin Email" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
10512 |  567 | 43 |         {errors.adminEmail && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.adminEmail.message}</p>}
10513 |  568 | 44 |         <input type="password" {...register('adminPassword')} placeholder="Admin Password" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
10514 |  569 | 45 |         {errors.adminPassword && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.adminPassword.message}</p>}
10515 |  570 | 46 |         <button type="submit" className="bg-blue-500 text-white p-2 w-full">Signup</button>
10516 |  571 | 47 |         <p className="mt-2 text-center">{message}</p>
10517 |  572 | 48 |       </form>
10518 |  573 | 49 |     </div>
10519 |  574 | 50 |   );
10520 |  575 | 51 | }
10521 |  576 | 
10522 |  577 | 
10523 |  578 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10524 |  579 | /components.json:
10525 |  580 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10526 |  581 |  1 | {
10527 |  582 |  2 |   "$schema": "https://ui.shadcn.com/schema.json",
10528 |  583 |  3 |   "style": "new-york",
10529 |  584 |  4 |   "rsc": true,
10530 |  585 |  5 |   "tsx": true,
10531 |  586 |  6 |   "tailwind": {

10854 |  909 |  9 |   baseDirectory: __dirname,
10855 |  910 | 10 | });

10864 |  919 | 
10865 |  920 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10866 |  921 | /lib/db/index.ts:
10867 |  922 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10868 |  923 |  1 | // lib/db/index.ts
10869 |  924 |  2 | import { drizzle } from 'drizzle-orm/node-postgres';
10870 |  925 |  3 | import { Pool, Client } from 'pg';
10871 |  926 |  4 | import { pgSchema } from 'drizzle-orm/pg-core';
10872 |  927 |  5 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
10873 |  928 |  6 | import { tenants } from './schema/shared';
10874 |  929 |  7 | import { usersColumns } from './schema/tenant';
10875 |  930 |  8 | import { env } from '../../env.mjs';
10876 |  931 |  9 | 
10877 |  932 | 10 | // Single shared pool for the entire database (all schemas)
10878 |  933 | 11 | const sharedPool = new Pool({ connectionString: env.DATABASE_URL });
10879 |  934 | 12 | export const sharedDb = drizzle(sharedPool);
10880 |  935 | 13 | 
10881 |  936 | 14 | // Function to get tenant-specific DB (dynamic schema qualification, same pool)
10882 |  937 | 15 | export async function getTenantDb(tenantId: string) {
10883 |  938 | 16 |   console.log(`[DB] Resolving tenant DB for ${tenantId}`);
10884 |  939 | 17 |   const tenant = await sharedDb.select().from(tenants).where(eq(tenants.tenantId, tenantId)).limit(1);
10885 |  940 | 18 |   if (!tenant.length) {
10886 |  941 | 19 |     console.error(`[DB] Tenant not found: ${tenantId}`);
10887 |  942 | 20 |     throw new Error('Tenant not found');
10888 |  943 | 21 |   }
10889 |  944 | 22 |   const schemaName = tenant[0].schemaName;
10890 |  945 | 23 | 
10891 |  946 | 24 |   const tenantSchema = pgSchema(schemaName);
10892 |  947 | 25 |   const users = tenantSchema.table('users', usersColumns);
10893 |  948 | 26 | 
10894 |  949 | 27 |   const tenantDb = drizzle(sharedPool, { schema: { users } });
10895 |  950 | 28 |   console.log(`[DB] Tenant DB initialized for schema: ${schemaName}`);
10896 |  951 | 29 |   return { db: tenantDb, schema: { users } };
10897 |  952 | 30 | }
10898 |  953 | 31 | 
10899 |  954 | 32 | // For raw queries (e.g., schema creation)
10900 |  955 | 33 | export async function executeRawQuery(query: string) {
10901 |  956 | 34 |   const client = new Client({ connectionString: env.DATABASE_URL });
10902 |  957 | 35 |   await client.connect();
10903 |  958 | 36 |   try {
10904 |  959 | 37 |     await client.query(query);
10905 |  960 | 38 |     console.log(`[DB] Executed raw query: ${query.substring(0, 50)}...`);
10906 |  961 | 39 |   } finally {
10907 |  962 | 40 |     await client.end();
10908 |  963 | 41 |   }
10909 |  964 | 42 | }
10910 |  965 | 43 | 
10911 |  966 | 44 | // Export types
10912 |  967 | 45 | export type TenantDb = Awaited<ReturnType<typeof getTenantDb>>;
10913 |  968 | 
10914 |  969 | 
10915 |  970 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10916 |  971 | /lib/db/schema/shared.ts:
10917 |  972 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10918 |  973 |  1 | // lib/db/schema/shared.ts
10919 |  974 |  2 | import { pgTable, serial, text, timestamp } from 'drizzle-orm/pg-core';
10920 |  975 |  3 | 
10921 |  976 |  4 | export const tenants = pgTable('tenants', {
10922 |  977 |  5 |   id: serial('id').primaryKey(),
10923 |  978 |  6 |   tenantId: text('tenant_id').notNull().unique(),
10924 |  979 |  7 |   schemaName: text('schema_name').notNull(),
10925 |  980 |  8 |   name: text('name').notNull(),
10926 |  981 |  9 |   createdAt: timestamp('created_at').defaultNow().notNull(),
10927 |  982 | 10 | });
10928 |  983 | 
10929 |  984 | 
10930 |  985 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10931 |  986 | /lib/db/schema/tenant.ts:
10932 |  987 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10933 |  988 | 1 | // lib/db/schema/tenant.ts
10934 |  989 | 2 | import { serial, text } from 'drizzle-orm/pg-core';
10935 |  990 | 3 | 
10936 |  991 | 4 | export const usersColumns = {
10937 |  992 | 5 |   id: serial('id').primaryKey(),
10938 |  993 | 6 |   name: text('name').notNull(),
10939 |  994 | 7 |   email: text('email').notNull().unique(),
10940 |  995 | 8 |   password: text('password').notNull(),  // Hashed
10941 |  996 | 9 | };
10942 |  997 | 
10943 |  998 | 
10944 |  999 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10945 | 1000 | /lib/dto/tenant.ts:
10946 | 1001 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10947 | 1002 |  1 | // lib/dto/tenant.ts
10948 | 1003 |  2 | import { z } from 'zod';
10949 | 1004 |  3 | 
10950 | 1005 |  4 | export const TenantSignupDto = z.object({
10951 | 1006 |  5 |   orgName: z.string().min(3, 'Org name must be at least 3 characters').max(50),
10952 | 1007 |  6 |   tenantId: z.string().min(3, 'Tenant ID must be at least 3 characters').max(50).regex(/^[a-z0-9-]+$/, 'Tenant ID must be lowercase letters, numbers, or hyphens'),
10953 | 1008 |  7 |   adminName: z.string().min(3, 'Admin name must be at least 3 characters').max(100),
10954 | 1009 |  8 |   adminEmail: z.string().email('Invalid email'),
10955 | 1010 |  9 |   adminPassword: z.string().min(8, 'Password must be at least 8 characters'),
10956 | 1011 | 10 | });
10957 | 1012 | 11 | 
10958 | 1013 | 12 | export const LoginDto = z.object({
10959 | 1014 | 13 |   email: z.string().email('Invalid email'),
10960 | 1015 | 14 |   password: z.string().min(8, 'Password must be at least 8 characters'),
10961 | 1016 | 15 | });
10962 | 1017 | 16 | 
10963 | 1018 | 17 | export type TenantSignupInput = z.infer<typeof TenantSignupDto>;
10964 | 1019 | 18 | export type LoginInput = z.infer<typeof LoginDto>;
10965 | 1020 | 
10966 | 1021 | 
10967 | 1022 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10968 | 1023 | /lib/server/tenant.ts:
10969 | 1024 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10970 | 1025 |  1 | // lib/server/tenant.ts
10971 | 1026 |  2 | import { sharedDb } from '@/lib/db';
10972 | 1027 |  3 | import { tenants } from '@/lib/db/schema/shared';
10973 | 1028 |  4 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
10974 | 1029 |  5 | 
10975 | 1030 |  6 | export async function validateTenant(tenantId: string) {
10976 | 1031 |  7 |   console.log(`[Tenant] Validating tenant: ${tenantId}`);
10977 | 1032 |  8 |   const tenant = await sharedDb.select().from(tenants).where(eq(tenants.tenantId, tenantId)).limit(1);
10978 | 1033 |  9 |   if (!tenant.length) {
10979 | 1034 | 10 |     console.error(`[Tenant] Invalid tenant: ${tenantId}`);
10980 | 1035 | 11 |     throw new Error('Tenant not found');
10981 | 1036 | 12 |   }
10982 | 1037 | 13 |   return tenant[0];
10983 | 1038 | 14 | }
10984 | 1039 | 
10985 | 1040 | 
10986 | 1041 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10987 | 1042 | /lib/utils.ts:
10988 | 1043 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10989 | 1044 | 1 | import { clsx, type ClassValue } from "clsx"
10990 | 1045 | 2 | import { twMerge } from "tailwind-merge"
10991 | 1046 | 3 | 
10992 | 1047 | 4 | export function cn(...inputs: ClassValue[]) {
10993 | 1048 | 5 |   return twMerge(clsx(inputs))
10994 | 1049 | 6 | }
10995 | 1050 | 7 | 
10996 | 1051 | 
10997 | 1052 | 
10998 | 1053 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10999 | 1054 | /middleware.ts:
11000 | 1055 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11001 | 1056 |  1 | // middleware.ts
11002 | 1057 |  2 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
11003 | 1058 |  3 | 
11004 | 1059 |  4 | export async function middleware(request: NextRequest) {
11005 | 1060 |  5 |   const host = request.headers.get('host') || '';
11006 | 1061 |  6 |   const parts = host.split('.');
11007 | 1062 |  7 |   const tenantId = parts.length > 2 ? parts[0] : null;  // e.g., tenant1.localhost:3000 â†’ tenant1
11008 | 1063 |  8 | 
11009 | 1064 |  9 |   console.log(`[Middleware] Host: ${host}, Tenant ID: ${tenantId}`);
11010 | 1065 | 10 | 
11011 | 1066 | 11 |   // Public routes (no tenant needed) - added '/'
11012 | 1067 | 12 |   const pathname = request.nextUrl.pathname;
11013 | 1068 | 13 |   if (!tenantId && (pathname === '/' || pathname.startsWith('/signup') || pathname.startsWith('/login') || pathname.startsWith('/api/tenants') || pathname.startsWith('/api/auth'))) {
11014 | 1069 | 14 |     return NextResponse.next();
11015 | 1070 | 15 |   }
11016 | 1071 | 16 | 
11017 | 1072 | 17 |   console.log(`[Middleware] Tenant ID found: ${tenantId}`);
11018 | 1073 | 18 |   if (!tenantId) {
11019 | 1074 | 19 |     console.error('[Middleware] No tenant ID found');
11020 | 1075 | 20 |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Tenant not found' }, { status: 404 });
11021 | 1076 | 21 |   }
11022 | 1077 | 22 | 
11023 | 1078 | 23 |   // Set tenant context in headers (no validation here)
11024 | 1079 | 24 |   const headers = new Headers(request.headers);
11025 | 1080 | 25 |   headers.set('x-tenant-id', tenantId);
11026 | 1081 | 26 |   console.log(`[Middleware] Setting x-tenant-id header: ${tenantId}`);
11027 | 1082 | 27 |   console.log(`[Middleware] headers: ${JSON.stringify(Array.from(headers.entries()))}`);
11028 | 1083 | 28 | 
11029 | 1084 | 29 |   return NextResponse.next({ request: { headers } });
11030 | 1085 | 30 | }
11031 | 1086 | 31 | 
11032 | 1087 | 32 | export const config = {
11033 | 1088 | 33 |   matcher: ['/((?!_next/static|_next/image|favicon.ico).*)'],
11034 | 1089 | 34 | };

19298 | /scripts/migrate-tenant.ts:
19299 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
19300 |  1 | // Create a new file: /scripts/migrate-tenant.ts
19301 |  2 | import { drizzle } from 'drizzle-orm/postgres-js';
19302 |  3 | import { migrate } from 'drizzle-orm/postgres-js/migrator';
19303 |  4 | import postgres from 'postgres';
19304 |  5 | import 'dotenv/config';
19305 |  6 | 
19306 |  7 | async function main() {
19307 |  8 |   const connectionString = process.env.TENANT_DATABASE_URL;
19308 |  9 | 
19309 | 10 |   if (!connectionString) {
19310 | 11 |     throw new Error('TENANT_DATABASE_URL environment variable is not set.');
19311 | 12 |   }
19312 | 13 | 
19313 | 14 |   // Use postgres 'on-the-fly' with max 1 connection for migrations
19314 | 15 |   const migrationClient = postgres(connectionString, { max: 1 });
19315 | 16 |   const db = drizzle(migrationClient);
19316 | 17 | 
19317 | 18 |   console.log('Running migrations for tenant...');
19318 | 19 | 
19319 | 20 |   await migrate(db, { migrationsFolder: './drizzle/tenant' });
19320 | 21 | 
19321 | 22 |   console.log('Migrations completed successfully.');
19322 | 23 | 
19323 | 24 |   await migrationClient.end();
19324 | 25 |   process.exit(0);
19325 | 26 | }
19326 | 27 | 
19327 | 28 | main().catch((err) => {
19328 | 29 |   console.error('Migration failed:', err);
19329 | 30 |   process.exit(1);
19330 | 31 | });
19331 | 
19332 |

 6 | const __dirname = dirname(__filename);
 7 |

 9 |   baseDirectory: __dirname,
10 | });

13 |   ...compat.extends("next/core-web-vitals", "next/typescript"),

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/hooks/use-mobile.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import * as React from "react"
 2 | 
 3 | const MOBILE_BREAKPOINT = 768
 4 | 
 5 | export function useIsMobile() {
 6 |   const [isMobile, setIsMobile] = React.useState<boolean | undefined>(undefined)
 7 | 
 8 |   React.useEffect(() => {
 9 |     const mql = window.matchMedia(`(max-width: ${MOBILE_BREAKPOINT - 1}px)`)
10 |     const onChange = () => {
11 |       setIsMobile(window.innerWidth < MOBILE_BREAKPOINT)
12 |     }
13 |     mql.addEventListener("change", onChange)
14 |     setIsMobile(window.innerWidth < MOBILE_BREAKPOINT)
15 |     return () => mql.removeEventListener("change", onChange)
16 |   }, [])
17 | 
18 |   return !!isMobile
19 | }

/lib/actions/auth.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | 'use server';
 2 | 
 3 | import { cookies } from "next/headers";
 4 | import { redirect } from "next/navigation";
 5 | 
 6 | export async function logout() {
 7 |   // Destroy the session cookie by setting its expiration date to the past
 8 |   (await
 9 |     // Destroy the session cookie by setting its expiration date to the past
10 |     cookies()).set("authToken", "", { expires: new Date(0) });
11 |   
12 |   // Redirect to the login page
13 |   redirect('/login');
14 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/lib/actions/role.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | 'use server';
 2 | 
 3 | import { cookies } from 'next/headers';
 4 | import { redirect } from 'next/navigation';
 5 | import { verify } from 'jsonwebtoken';
 6 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 7 | import { getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
 8 | import { revalidatePath } from 'next/cache';
 9 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
10 | import log from '../logger';
11 | import { roles } from '../db/schema/tenant';
12 | import { RoleFormSchema } from '../dto/role';
13 | 
14 | interface UserSession {
15 |   tenantId: string;
16 |   userId: number;
17 | }
18 | 
19 | async function getSession() {
20 |   const token = (await cookies()).get('authToken')?.value;
21 |   if (!token) {
22 |     redirect('/login');
23 |   }
24 |   try {
25 |     return verify(token, env.JWT_SECRET) as UserSession;
26 |   } catch (e) {
27 |     log.error({ error: e }, 'Invalid session token');
28 |     redirect('/login');
29 |   }
30 | }
31 | 
32 | export async function getRoles() {
33 |     const session = await getSession();
34 |     const db = await getTenantDb(session.tenantId);
35 |     return db.query.roles.findMany();
36 | }
37 | 
38 | export async function upsertRole(data: unknown) {
39 |     const session = await getSession();
40 |     const db = await getTenantDb(session.tenantId);
41 | 
42 |     const validatedFields = RoleFormSchema.safeParse(data);
43 | 
44 |     if (!validatedFields.success) {
45 |         return { success: false, message: 'Invalid role data.' };
46 |     }
47 | 
48 |     const { id, name, description } = validatedFields.data;
49 | 
50 |     try {
51 |         if (id) {
52 |             await db.update(roles).set({ name, description }).where(eq(roles.id, id));
53 |         } else {
54 |             await db.insert(roles).values({ name, description });
55 |         }
56 |         revalidatePath('/dashboard/roles');
57 |         revalidatePath('/dashboard/users'); // Also revalidate users page in case roles changed
58 |         return { success: true, message: `Role successfully ${id ? 'updated' : 'created'}.` };
59 |     } catch (error) {
60 |         log.error({ error }, 'Failed to upsert role');
61 |         return { success: false, message: 'Failed to save role.' };
62 |     }
63 | }
64 | 
65 | export async function deleteRole(roleId: number) {
66 |     const session = await getSession();
67 |     const db = await getTenantDb(session.tenantId);
68 | 
69 |     try {
70 |         // You might want to add a check here to ensure the role is not in use
71 |         await db.delete(roles).where(eq(roles.id, roleId));
72 |         revalidatePath('/dashboard/roles');
73 |         revalidatePath('/dashboard/users');
74 |         return { success: true, message: 'Role deleted successfully.' };
75 |     } catch (error) {
76 |         log.error({ error, roleId }, 'Failed to delete role');
77 |         return { success: false, message: 'Failed to delete role. It might be in use.' };
78 |     }
79 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/lib/actions/user.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1 | 'use server';
  2 | 
  3 | import { cookies } from 'next/headers';
  4 | import { redirect } from 'next/navigation';
  5 | import { verify } from 'jsonwebtoken';
  6 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
  7 | import { getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
  8 | import { UserFormSchema, type UserFormInput } from '@/lib/dto/user';
  9 | import { users, usersToRoles } from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
 10 | import { revalidatePath } from 'next/cache';
 11 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
 12 | import bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
 13 | import log from '../logger';
 14 | 
 15 | interface UserSession {
 16 |   tenantId: string;
 17 |   userId: number;
 18 | }
 19 | 
 20 | function isDatabaseError(error: unknown): error is { code: string; message: string } {
 21 |     return typeof error === 'object' && error !== null && 'code' in error;
 22 | }
 23 | 
 24 | async function getSession() {
 25 |   const token = (await cookies()).get('authToken')?.value;
 26 |   if (!token) {
 27 |     redirect('/login');
 28 |   }
 29 |   try {
 30 |     return verify(token, env.JWT_SECRET) as UserSession;
 31 |   } catch (e) {
 32 |     log.error({ error: e }, 'Invalid session token');
 33 |     redirect('/login');
 34 |   }
 35 | }
 36 | 
 37 | export async function getUsersWithRoles() {
 38 |     const session = await getSession();
 39 |     const db = await getTenantDb(session.tenantId);
 40 |     
 41 |     const usersWithRoles = await db.query.users.findMany({
 42 |         with: {
 43 |             usersToRoles: {
 44 |                 with: {
 45 |                     role: true
 46 |                 }
 47 |             }
 48 |         }
 49 |     });
 50 | 
 51 |     return usersWithRoles.map(user => ({
 52 |        ...user,
 53 |         roles: user.usersToRoles.map(ur => ur.role.name).join(', ')
 54 |     }));
 55 | }
 56 | 
 57 | // The invalid re-export has been removed from here.
 58 | 
 59 | export async function upsertUserAction(data: UserFormInput) {
 60 |     const session = await getSession();
 61 |     const db = await getTenantDb(session.tenantId);
 62 | 
 63 |     const { id, name, email, password, roles: roleIdsStr } = data;
 64 |     const roleIds = roleIdsStr.map(Number);
 65 |     
 66 |     try {
 67 |         await db.transaction(async (tx) => {
 68 |             if (id) { // Update existing user
 69 |                 const userToUpdate: { name: string; email: string; password?: string } = { name, email };
 70 |                 if (password) {
 71 |                     const hashedPassword = await bcrypt.hash(password, 12);
 72 |                     userToUpdate.password = hashedPassword;
 73 |                 }
 74 |                 
 75 |                 await tx.update(users).set(userToUpdate).where(eq(users.id, id));
 76 |                 
 77 |                 await tx.delete(usersToRoles).where(eq(usersToRoles.userId, id));
 78 |                 if (roleIds.length > 0) {
 79 |                     await tx.insert(usersToRoles).values(roleIds.map(roleId => ({
 80 |                         userId: id,
 81 |                         roleId: roleId
 82 |                     })));
 83 |                 }
 84 | 
 85 |             } else { // Create new user
 86 |                 if (!password) throw new Error("Password is required for new users.");
 87 |                 
 88 |                 const hashedPassword = await bcrypt.hash(password, 12);
 89 |                 
 90 |                 const [newUser] = await tx.insert(users).values({
 91 |                     name,
 92 |                     email,
 93 |                     password: hashedPassword,
 94 |                 }).returning({ id: users.id });
 95 | 
 96 |                 if (roleIds.length > 0) {
 97 |                     await tx.insert(usersToRoles).values(roleIds.map(roleId => ({
 98 |                         userId: newUser.id,
 99 |                         roleId: roleId
100 |                     })));
101 |                 }
102 |             }
103 |         });
104 |     } catch (error: unknown) {
105 |         log.error({ error }, 'Failed to upsert user');
106 |         if (isDatabaseError(error) && error.code === '23505') {
107 |             return { 
108 |                 success: false, 
109 |                 message: "A user with this email already exists.",
110 |                 errors: { email: ["This email is already in use."] }
111 |             };
112 |         }
113 |         return { success: false, message: "An unexpected error occurred." };
114 |     }
115 | 
116 |     revalidatePath('/dashboard/users');
117 |     return { success: true, message: `User successfully ${id ? 'updated' : 'created'}.` };
118 | }
119 | 
120 | export async function deleteUserAction(userId: number) {
121 |     const session = await getSession();
122 |     const db = await getTenantDb(session.tenantId);
123 | 
124 |     if (userId === session.userId) {
125 |         return { success: false, message: "You cannot delete your own account." };
126 |     }
127 | 
128 |     try {
129 |         await db.delete(users).where(eq(users.id, userId));
130 |         revalidatePath('/dashboard/users');
131 |         return { success: true, message: "User deleted successfully." };
132 |     } catch (error) {
133 |         log.error({ error, userId }, 'Failed to delete user');
134 |         return { success: false, message: "Failed to delete user." };
135 |     }
136 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/lib/crypto.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { createCipheriv, createDecipheriv, scryptSync, randomBytes } from 'crypto';
 2 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 3 | 
 4 | const ALGORITHM = 'aes-256-gcm';
 5 | const IV_LENGTH = 16;
 6 | const TAG_LENGTH = 16;
 7 | const KEY = scryptSync(env.ENCRYPTION_KEY, 'salt', 32);
 8 | 
 9 | export function encrypt(text: string): string {
10 |   const iv = randomBytes(IV_LENGTH);
11 |   const cipher = createCipheriv(ALGORITHM, KEY, iv);
12 |   const encrypted = Buffer.concat([cipher.update(text, 'utf8'), cipher.final()]);
13 |   const tag = cipher.getAuthTag();
14 |   return Buffer.concat([iv, tag, encrypted]).toString('hex');
15 | }
16 | 
17 | export function decrypt(encryptedText: string): string {
18 |   const data = Buffer.from(encryptedText, 'hex');
19 |   const iv = data.slice(0, IV_LENGTH);
20 |   const tag = data.slice(IV_LENGTH, IV_LENGTH + TAG_LENGTH);
21 |   const encrypted = data.slice(IV_LENGTH + TAG_LENGTH);
22 |   const decipher = createDecipheriv(ALGORITHM, KEY, iv);
23 |   decipher.setAuthTag(tag);
24 |   const decrypted = Buffer.concat([decipher.update(encrypted), decipher.final()]);
25 |   return decrypted.toString('utf8');
26 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/lib/db/index.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | // lib/db/index.ts
 2 | import { drizzle, NodePgDatabase } from 'drizzle-orm/node-postgres';
 3 | import { Pool } from 'pg';
 4 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
 5 | import { tenants } from './schema/shared';
 6 | import * as tenantSchema from './schema/tenant';
 7 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 8 | import { decrypt } from '@/lib/crypto';
 9 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
10 | 
11 | // 1. Main DB Client (for managing tenant metadata)
12 | const mainPool = new Pool({ connectionString: env.POSTGRES_URL });
13 | export const mainDb = drizzle(mainPool, { schema: { tenants } });
14 | 
15 | // 2. Tenant DB Client Cache
16 | const tenantDbCache = new Map<string, NodePgDatabase<typeof tenantSchema>>();
17 | 
18 | // 3. Function to get a tenant-specific DB client
19 | export async function getTenantDb(tenantId: string): Promise<NodePgDatabase<typeof tenantSchema>> {
20 |   if (tenantDbCache.has(tenantId)) {
21 |     log.info({ tenantId }, 'Tenant DB client cache HIT.');
22 |     return tenantDbCache.get(tenantId)!;
23 |   }
24 |   log.info({ tenantId }, 'Tenant DB client cache MISS.');
25 | 
26 |   const results = await mainDb
27 |     .select({ connectionString: tenants.connectionString })
28 |     .from(tenants)
29 |     .where(eq(tenants.tenantId, tenantId))
30 |     .limit(1);
31 | 
32 |   // --- Start of Fix ---
33 |   const tenantData = results[0]; // Access the first element of the array
34 | 
35 |   if (!tenantData) {
36 |     log.error({ tenantId }, 'Tenant not found in main database.');
37 |     throw new Error('Tenant not found');
38 |   }
39 | 
40 |   const decryptedConnectionString = decrypt(tenantData.connectionString);
41 |   // --- End of Fix ---
42 | 
43 |   const tenantPool = new Pool({ connectionString: decryptedConnectionString });
44 |   const tenantDb = drizzle(tenantPool, { schema: tenantSchema });
45 | 
46 |   tenantDbCache.set(tenantId, tenantDb);
47 |   log.info({ tenantId }, 'Created and cached new tenant DB client.');
48 | 
49 |   return tenantDb;
50 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/lib/db/migrate.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | // In /lib/db/migrate.ts
 2 | import { drizzle } from 'drizzle-orm/postgres-js';
 3 | import { migrate } from 'drizzle-orm/postgres-js/migrator';
 4 | import postgres from 'postgres';
 5 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
 6 | 
 7 | export async function runTenantMigrations(connectionString: string) {
 8 |   // Use postgres 'on-the-fly' with max 1 connection for migrations
 9 |   const migrationClient = postgres(connectionString, { max: 1 });
10 |   const db = drizzle(migrationClient);
11 | 
12 |   try {
13 |     log.info('Starting tenant migration...');
14 |     await migrate(db, { migrationsFolder: './drizzle/tenant' }); // Assumes tenant migrations are in 'drizzle/tenant'
15 |     log.info('Tenant migration completed successfully.');
16 |   } catch (error) {
17 |     log.error({ error }, 'Tenant migration failed.');
18 |     // Re-throw the error to ensure the API call fails loudly
19 |     throw new Error('Could not run tenant migrations.');
20 |   } finally {
21 |     // Ensure the connection is closed
22 |     await migrationClient.end();
23 |   }
24 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/lib/db/schema/shared.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { pgTable, serial, text, timestamp } from 'drizzle-orm/pg-core';
 2 | 
 3 | export const tenants = pgTable('tenants', {
 4 |   id: serial('id').primaryKey(),
 5 |   tenantId: text('tenant_id').notNull().unique(),
 6 |   name: text('name').notNull(),
 7 |   neonProjectId: text('neon_project_id').notNull().unique(),
 8 |   connectionString: text('connection_string').notNull(), // Encrypted
 9 |   createdAt: timestamp('created_at').defaultNow().notNull(),
10 | });


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/lib/db/schema/tenant.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { serial, text, pgTable, integer, timestamp, primaryKey } from 'drizzle-orm/pg-core';
 2 | import { relations } from 'drizzle-orm';
 3 | 
 4 | // Existing users table
 5 | export const users = pgTable('users', {
 6 |   id: serial('id').primaryKey(),
 7 |   name: text('name').notNull(),
 8 |   email: text('email').notNull().unique(),
 9 |   password: text('password').notNull(),
10 | });
11 | 
12 | // New roles table
13 | export const roles = pgTable('roles', {
14 |     id: serial('id').primaryKey(),
15 |     name: text('name').notNull().unique(),
16 |     description: text('description'),
17 |     createdAt: timestamp('created_at').defaultNow().notNull(),
18 | });
19 | 
20 | // New users_to_roles join table
21 | export const usersToRoles = pgTable('users_to_roles', {
22 |     userId: integer('user_id').notNull().references(() => users.id, { onDelete: 'cascade' }),
23 |     roleId: integer('role_id').notNull().references(() => roles.id, { onDelete: 'cascade' }),
24 | }, (t) => ({
25 |     pk: primaryKey({ columns: [t.userId, t.roleId] }),
26 | }));
27 | 
28 | // --- RELATIONS ---
29 | 
30 | export const usersRelations = relations(users, ({ many }) => ({
31 |     usersToRoles: many(usersToRoles),
32 | }));
33 | 
34 | export const rolesRelations = relations(roles, ({ many }) => ({
35 |     usersToRoles: many(usersToRoles),
36 | }));
37 | 
38 | export const usersToRolesRelations = relations(usersToRoles, ({ one }) => ({
39 |     role: one(roles, {
40 |         fields: [usersToRoles.roleId],
41 |         references: [roles.id],
42 |     }),
43 |     user: one(users, {
44 |         fields: [usersToRoles.userId],
45 |         references: [users.id],
46 |     }),
47 | }));
48 |

2 | 
3 | export const RoleFormSchema = z.object({
4 |   id: z.number().optional(),
5 |   name: z.string().min(2, { message: 'Role name must be at least 2 characters.' }),
6 |   description: z.string().optional(),
7 | });
8 | 
9 | export type RoleFormInput = z.infer<typeof RoleFormSchema>;

/lib/dto/tenant.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | // lib/dto/tenant.ts
 2 | import { z } from 'zod';
 3 | 
 4 | export const TenantSignupDto = z.object({
 5 |   orgName: z.string().min(3, 'Org name must be at least 3 characters').max(50),
 6 |   tenantId: z.string().min(3, 'Tenant ID must be at least 3 characters').max(50).regex(/^[a-z0-9-]+$/, 'Tenant ID must be lowercase letters, numbers, or hyphens'),
 7 |   adminName: z.string().min(3, 'Admin name must be at least 3 characters').max(100),
 8 |   adminEmail: z.string().email('Invalid email'),
 9 |   adminPassword: z.string().min(8, 'Password must be at least 8 characters'),
10 | });
11 | 
12 | export const LoginDto = z.object({
13 |   email: z.string().email('Invalid email'),
14 |   password: z.string().min(8, 'Password must be at least 8 characters'),
15 | });
16 | 
17 | export const LoginWithTenantDto = LoginDto.extend({
18 |   tenantId: z.string().min(1, 'Tenant ID is required'),
19 | });
20 | 
21 | export type TenantSignupInput = z.infer<typeof TenantSignupDto>;
22 | export type LoginInput = z.infer<typeof LoginDto>;
23 | export type LoginWithTenantInput = z.infer<typeof LoginWithTenantDto>;


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/lib/dto/user.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { z } from 'zod';
 2 | 
 3 | export const UserFormSchema = z.object({
 4 |   id: z.number().optional(),
 5 |   name: z.string().min(2, { message: 'Name must be at least 2 characters.' }),
 6 |   email: z.string().email({ message: 'Please enter a valid email.' }),
 7 |   password: z.string().optional(),
 8 |   roles: z.array(z.string()).min(1, { message: 'At least one role must be selected.' }),
 9 | }).refine(data => {
10 |     // If it's a new user (no id), password must be a string of at least 8 chars.
11 |     if (!data.id) {
12 |         return !!data.password && data.password.length >= 8;
13 |     }
14 |     // If it's an existing user and a password IS provided, it must be at least 8 chars.
15 |     // If no password is provided for an existing user, it's valid (means no change).
16 |     if (data.id && data.password) {
17 |         return data.password.length >= 8;
18 |     }
19 |     return true;
20 | }, {
21 |     message: "Password must be at least 8 characters.",
22 |     path: ["password"], // Point the error to the password field
23 | });
24 | 
25 | export type UserFormInput = z.infer<typeof UserFormSchema>;

/lib/logger.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import pino from 'pino';
 2 | 
 3 | const log = pino({
 4 |   level: process.env.LOG_LEVEL || 'info',
 5 |   formatters: {
 6 |     level: (label: string) => ({ level: label }),
 7 |   },
 8 |   timestamp: pino.stdTimeFunctions.isoTime,
 9 | });

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/lib/neon/api.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | // In lib/neon/api.ts
 2 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 3 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
 4 | 
 5 | const NEON_API_BASE = 'https://console.neon.tech/api/v2';
 6 | 
 7 | export async function createNeonProject(tenantId: string) {
 8 |   log.info({ tenantId }, '[NeonAPI] Starting project creation process.');
 9 | 
10 |   const headers = {
11 |     'Authorization': `Bearer ${env.NEON_API_KEY}`,
12 |     'Content-Type': 'application/json',
13 |     'Accept': 'application/json',
14 |   };
15 | 
16 |   const projectResponse = await fetch(`${NEON_API_BASE}/projects`, {
17 |     method: 'POST',
18 |     headers,
19 |     body: JSON.stringify({
20 |       project: { name: `edux-tenant-${tenantId}` },
21 |     }),
22 |   });
23 | 
24 |   if (!projectResponse.ok) {
25 |     const errorBody = await projectResponse.text();
26 |     log.error({ tenantId, status: projectResponse.status, errorBody }, '[NeonAPI] Failed to create project.');
27 |     throw new Error(`Failed to create Neon project: ${errorBody}`);
28 |   }
29 | 
30 |   const responseData = await projectResponse.json();
31 |   const project = responseData.project;
32 |   const connectionDetails = responseData.connection_uris?.[0];
33 |   const connection_uri = connectionDetails?.connection_uri;
34 | 
35 |   if (!connection_uri) {
36 |     log.error({ responseData }, '[NeonAPI] Connection URI could not be extracted from the response.');
37 |     throw new Error('Connection URI could not be extracted from the Neon API response.');
38 |   }
39 | 
40 |   log.info({ tenantId, projectId: project.id }, '[NeonAPI] Project created successfully.');
41 | 
42 |   // The modification to create a pooled string has been removed.
43 |   // We will now return the original, direct connection string.
44 | 
45 |   return {
46 |     projectId: project.id,
47 |     connectionString: connection_uri,
48 |   };
49 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/lib/server/tenant.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | // lib/server/tenant.ts
 2 | import { mainDb } from '@/lib/db';
 3 | import { tenants } from '@/lib/db/schema/shared';
 4 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
 5 | 
 6 | export async function validateTenant(tenantId: string) {
 7 |   console.log(`[Tenant] Validating tenant: ${tenantId}`);
 8 |   const results = await mainDb.select().from(tenants).where(eq(tenants.tenantId, tenantId)).limit(1);
 9 |   const tenant = results[0];
10 | 
11 |   if (!tenant) {
12 |     console.error(`[Tenant] Invalid tenant: ${tenantId}`);
13 |     throw new Error('Tenant not found');
14 |   }
15 | 
16 |   return tenant;
17 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/lib/session.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { cookies } from 'next/headers';
 2 | import { redirect } from 'next/navigation';
 3 | import { verify } from 'jsonwebtoken';
 4 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 5 | import log from './logger';
 6 | 
 7 | export interface UserSession {
 8 |   tenantId: string;
 9 |   userId: number;
10 |   email: string;
11 |   name: string;
12 | }
13 | 
14 | /**
15 |  * Retrieves the session from the auth token cookie.
16 |  * Redirects to '/login' if the token is missing or invalid.
17 |  * This function should be used in Server Components and Server Actions to protect routes.
18 |  * @returns {Promise<UserSession>} The decoded user session.
19 |  */
20 | export async function getSession(): Promise<UserSession> {
21 |   const token = (await cookies()).get('authToken')?.value;
22 | 
23 |   if (!token) {
24 |     redirect('/login');
25 |   }
26 | 
27 |   try {
28 |     // Verify the token and return the session payload
29 |     const session = verify(token, env.JWT_SECRET) as UserSession;
30 |     return session;
31 |   } catch (e) {
32 |     log.error({ error: e }, 'Invalid session token. Redirecting to login.');
33 |     // If verification fails, redirect to login
34 |     redirect('/login');
35 |   }
36 | }

/lib/utils.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | import { clsx, type ClassValue } from "clsx"
2 | import { twMerge } from "tailwind-merge"
3 | 
4 | export function cn(...inputs: ClassValue[]) {
5 |   return twMerge(clsx(inputs))
6 | }
7 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/middleware.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
 2 | import logger from './lib/logger';
 3 | 
 4 | // Extracts the tenant ID from the hostname.
 5 | const getTenantId = (host: string): string | null => {
 6 |   const parts = host.split('.');
 7 | 
 8 |   // Handles tenant.localhost:3000 in development
 9 |   if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' && parts.length === 2 && parts[1].startsWith('localhost')) {
10 |     return parts[0];
11 |   }
12 | 
13 |   // Handles tenant.example.com in production
14 |   if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' && parts.length > 1 && parts[0] !== 'www') {
15 |     return parts[0];
16 |   }
17 | 
18 |   return null;
19 | };
20 | 
21 | 
22 | export function middleware(request: NextRequest) {
23 |   const host = request.headers.get('host') || '';
24 |   const tenantId = getTenantId(host);
25 |   const { pathname } = request.nextUrl;
26 |   const log = logger.child({ tenantId, pathname });
27 | 
28 |   log.info('Middleware processing request');
29 | 
30 |   console.log('Incoming cookies:', request.cookies.getAll());
31 |   console.log('TenantId:', tenantId, 'Pathname:', pathname);
32 | 
33 |   const headers = new Headers(request.headers);
34 |   if (tenantId) {
35 |     headers.set('x-tenant-id', tenantId);
36 |   }
37 | 
38 |   // Allow public routes regardless of tenant.
39 |   if (pathname === '/' || pathname === '/signup') {
40 |     return NextResponse.next({ request: { headers } });
41 |   }
42 | 
43 |   // If on a tenant subdomain, allow access to login.
44 |   if (tenantId && pathname.startsWith('/login')) {
45 |       return NextResponse.next({ request: { headers } });
46 |   }
47 | 
48 |   // All API routes are allowed to pass through for now;
49 |   // authentication will be handled at the route level.
50 |   if (pathname.startsWith('/api')) {
51 |     return NextResponse.next({ request: { headers } });
52 |   }
53 | 
54 |   // For dashboard access, check for an auth token.
55 |   const token = request.cookies.get('authToken');
56 |   if (pathname.startsWith('/dashboard') && !token) {
57 |     log.warn('Access to dashboard denied without token, redirecting to login.');
58 |     const loginUrl = new URL('/login', request.url);
59 |     return NextResponse.redirect(loginUrl);
60 |   }
61 | 
62 |   return NextResponse.next({ request: { headers } });
63 | }
64 | 
65 | export const config = {
66 |   matcher: [
67 |     /*
68 |      * Match all request paths except for the ones starting with:
69 |      * - _next/static (static files)
70 |      * - _next/image (image optimization files)
71 |      * - favicon.ico (favicon file)
72 |      */
73 |     '/((?!_next/static|_next/image|favicon.ico).*)',
74 |   ],
75 | };


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/next.config.mjs:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | /** @type {import('next').NextConfig} */
2 | const nextConfig = {
3 |   reactStrictMode: true,
4 |   transpilePackages: ['geist'], // Required for Geist font to work correctly
5 | };
6 | 
7 | export default nextConfig;

 100 | 
 101 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 102 | /README.md:
 103 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 104 | 1 | <!-- run psgl inside docker container -->
 105 | 2 | docker exec -it eduspace-postgres psql -U eduspace_user -d eduspace_db
 106 | 3 | 
 107 | 
 108 | 
 109 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 110 | /app/api/auth/login/route.ts:
 111 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 112 |  1 | // app/api/auth/login/route.ts
 113 |  2 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
 114 |  3 | import { getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
 115 |  4 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
 116 |  5 | import bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
 117 |  6 | import jwt from 'jsonwebtoken';
 118 |  7 | import { LoginDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 119 |  8 | import { validateTenant } from '@/lib/server/tenant';
 120 |  9 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 121 | 10 | 
 122 | 11 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';
 123 | 12 | 
 124 | 13 | export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
 125 | 14 |   try {
 126 | 15 |     const tenantId = request.headers.get('x-tenant-id');
 127 | 16 |     if (!tenantId) {
 128 | 17 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Tenant required' }, { status: 400 });
 129 | 18 |     }
 130 | 19 | 
 131 | 20 |     // Validate tenant existence
 132 | 21 |     await validateTenant(tenantId);
 133 | 22 | 
 134 | 23 |     const body = await request.json();
 135 | 24 |     const data = LoginDto.parse(body);
 136 | 25 | 
 137 | 26 |     console.log(`[API] Login attempt for tenant: ${tenantId}, email: ${data.email}`);
 138 | 27 | 
 139 | 28 |     const { db: tenantDb, schema } = await getTenantDb(tenantId);
 140 | 29 |     const users = await tenantDb.select().from(schema.users).where(eq(schema.users.email, data.email)).limit(1);
 141 | 30 | 
 142 | 31 |     if (!users.length) {
 143 | 32 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid credentials' }, { status: 401 });
 144 | 33 |     }
 145 | 34 | 
 146 | 35 |     const user = users[0];
 147 | 36 |     const match = await bcrypt.compare(data.password, user.password);
 148 | 37 |     if (!match) {
 149 | 38 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid credentials' }, { status: 401 });
 150 | 39 |     }
 151 | 40 | 
 152 | 41 |     const token = jwt.sign({ tenantId, userId: user.id }, env.JWT_SECRET, { expiresIn: '1h' });
 153 | 42 | 
 154 | 43 |     const response = NextResponse.json({ message: 'Login successful' });
 155 | 44 |     response.cookies.set('authToken', token, { httpOnly: true, secure: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production', sameSite: 'strict', maxAge: 3600 });
 156 | 45 |     return response;
 157 | 46 |   } catch (err) {
 158 | 47 |     console.error('[API] Login failed:', err);
 159 | 48 |     if (err instanceof Error && err.message === 'Tenant not found') {
 160 | 49 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Tenant not found' }, { status: 404 });
 161 | 50 |     }
 162 | 51 |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal error' }, { status: 500 });
 163 | 52 |   }
 164 | 53 | }
 165 | 
 166 | 
 167 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 168 | /app/api/tenants/route.ts:
 169 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 170 |  1 | // app/api/tenants/route.ts
 171 |  2 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
 172 |  3 | import { sharedDb, getTenantDb, executeRawQuery } from '@/lib/db';
 173 |  4 | import { tenants } from '@/lib/db/schema/shared';
 174 |  5 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
 175 |  6 | import bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
 176 |  7 | import { TenantSignupDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 177 |  8 | import z from 'zod/v4';
 178 |  9 | 
 179 | 10 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';
 180 | 11 | 
 181 | 12 | export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
 182 | 13 |   try {
 183 | 14 |     const body = await request.json();
 184 | 15 |     const data = TenantSignupDto.parse(body);
 185 | 16 |     const tenantId = data.tenantId; 
 186 | 17 |     const schemaName = `tenant_${tenantId}`;
 187 | 18 | 
 188 | 19 |     console.log(`[API] Creating tenant: ${tenantId}, schema: ${schemaName}`);
 189 | 20 | 
 190 | 21 |     const existing = await sharedDb.select().from(tenants).where(eq(tenants.tenantId, tenantId));
 191 | 22 |     if (existing.length) {
 192 | 23 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Tenant ID already exists' }, { status: 409 });
 193 | 24 |     }
 194 | 25 | 
 195 | 26 |     // Create schema and users table
 196 | 27 |     await executeRawQuery(`CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS "${schemaName}";`);
 197 | 28 |     await executeRawQuery(`
 198 | 29 |       CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "${schemaName}".users (
 199 | 30 |         id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 200 | 31 |         name TEXT NOT NULL,
 201 | 32 |         email TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
 202 | 33 |         password TEXT NOT NULL
 203 | 34 |       );
 204 | 35 |     `);
 205 | 36 | 
 206 | 37 |     // Insert tenant metadata
 207 | 38 |     await sharedDb.insert(tenants).values({
 208 | 39 |       tenantId,
 209 | 40 |       schemaName,
 210 | 41 |       name: data.orgName,
 211 | 42 |     });
 212 | 43 | 
 213 | 44 |     // Insert admin user
 214 | 45 |     const { db: tenantDb, schema } = await getTenantDb(tenantId);
 215 | 46 |     const hashedPassword = await bcrypt.hash(data.adminPassword, 12);  // Stronger salt (12 rounds)
 216 | 47 |     await tenantDb.insert(schema.users).values({
 217 | 48 |       name: data.adminName,
 218 | 49 |       email: data.adminEmail,
 219 | 50 |       password: hashedPassword,
 220 | 51 |     });
 221 | 52 | 
 222 | 53 |     console.log(`[API] Tenant created successfully: ${tenantId}`);
 223 | 54 |     return NextResponse.json({ message: 'Tenant created', tenantId });
 224 | 55 |   } catch (err) {
 225 | 56 |     console.error('[API] Tenant creation failed:', err);
 226 | 57 |     if (err instanceof z.ZodError) {
 227 | 58 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: err }, { status: 400 });
 228 | 59 |     }
 229 | 60 |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal error' }, { status: 500 });
 230 | 61 |   }
 231 | 62 | }
 232 | 
 233 | 
 234 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 235 | /app/dashboard/page.tsx:
 236 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 237 |  1 | // app/dashboard/page.tsx
 238 |  2 | import { cookies } from 'next/headers';
 239 |  3 | import { verify } from 'jsonwebtoken';
 240 |  4 | import { getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
 241 |  5 | 
 242 |  6 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
 243 |  7 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 244 |  8 | 
 245 |  9 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';  // Node runtime
 246 | 10 | 
 247 | 11 | export default async function DashboardPage() {
 248 | 12 |   const cookieStore = cookies();
 249 | 13 |   const token = (await cookieStore).get('authToken')?.value;
 250 | 14 |   if (!token) {
 251 | 15 |     return <div>Unauthorized</div>;
 252 | 16 |   }
 253 | 17 | 
 254 | 18 |   let decoded;
 255 | 19 |   try {
 256 | 20 |     decoded = verify(token, env.JWT_SECRET) as { tenantId: string; userId: number };
 257 | 21 | 
 258 | 22 |     const { db: tenantDb, schema } = await getTenantDb(decoded.tenantId);
 259 | 23 |     const user = await tenantDb.select().from(schema.users).where(eq(schema.users.id, decoded.userId)).limit(1);
 260 | 24 | 
 261 | 25 |     return (
 262 | 26 |       <div className="min-h-screen p-8 bg-gray-100">
 263 | 27 |         <h1 className="text-3xl">Welcome to {decoded.tenantId} Dashboard</h1>
 264 | 28 |         <p>Email: {user[0]?.email}</p>
 265 | 29 |       </div>
 266 | 30 |     );
 267 | 31 |   } catch (err) {
 268 | 32 |     if (err === 'Tenant not found') {
 269 | 33 |       return <div>Tenant not found</div>;
 270 | 34 |     }
 271 | 35 |     return <div>Invalid token</div>;
 272 | 36 |   }
 273 | 37 | }
 274 |

 450 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 451 | /app/login/page.tsx:
 452 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 453 |  1 | // app/login/page.tsx
 454 |  2 | 'use client';
 455 |  3 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
 456 |  4 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
 457 |  5 | import { LoginInput, LoginDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 458 |  6 | import { useState } from 'react';
 459 |  7 | import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';
 460 |  8 | 
 461 |  9 | export default function LoginPage() {
 462 | 10 |   const [message, setMessage] = useState('');
 463 | 11 |   const router = useRouter();
 464 | 12 |   const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm<LoginInput>({
 465 | 13 |     resolver: zodResolver(LoginDto),
 466 | 14 |   });
 467 | 15 | 
 468 | 16 |   const onSubmit = async (data: LoginInput) => {
 469 | 17 |     const res = await fetch('/api/auth/login', {
 470 | 18 |       method: 'POST',
 471 | 19 |       headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
 472 | 20 |       body: JSON.stringify(data),
 473 | 21 |     });
 474 | 22 |     if (res.ok) {
 475 | 23 |       router.push('/dashboard');
 476 | 24 |     } else {
 477 | 25 |       const result = await res.json();
 478 | 26 |       setMessage(result.error || 'Login failed');
 479 | 27 |     }
 480 | 28 |   };
 481 | 29 | 
 482 | 30 |   return (
 483 | 31 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-800">
 484 | 32 |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="bg-green p-8 rounded shadow-md w-96">
 485 | 33 |         <h1 className="text-2xl mb-4">Login</h1>
 486 | 34 |         <input {...register('email')} placeholder="Email" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
 487 | 35 |         {errors.email && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.email.message}</p>}
 488 | 36 |         <input type="password" {...register('password')} placeholder="Password" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
 489 | 37 |         {errors.password && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.password.message}</p>}
 490 | 38 |         <button type="submit" className="bg-blue-500 text-white p-2 w-full">Login</button>
 491 | 39 |         <p className="mt-2">{message}</p>
 492 | 40 |       </form>
 493 | 41 |     </div>
 494 | 42 |   );
 495 | 43 | }
 496 |

 499 | /app/page.tsx:
 500 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 501 |  1 | // app/page.tsx
 502 |  2 | import Link from 'next/link';
 503 |  3 | 
 504 |  4 | export default function HomePage() {
 505 |  5 |   return (
 506 |  6 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex flex-col items-center justify-center bg-gray-800 text-center">
 507 |  7 |       <h1 className="text-4xl font-bold mb-4">Welcome to EduX SaaS</h1>
 508 |  8 |       <p className="text-xl mb-8">A multi-tenant platform for education management</p>
 509 |  9 |       <div className="space-x-4">
 510 | 10 |         <Link href="/login">
 511 | 11 |           <button className="bg-blue-500 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-600">Login</button>
 512 | 12 |         </Link>
 513 | 13 |         <Link href="/signup">
 514 | 14 |           <button className="bg-green-500 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded hover:bg-green-600">Signup</button>
 515 | 15 |         </Link>
 516 | 16 |       </div>
 517 | 17 |     </div>
 518 | 18 |   );
 519 | 19 | }

 521 | 
 522 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 523 | /app/signup/page.tsx:
 524 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 525 |  1 | // app/signup/page.tsx
 526 |  2 | 'use client';
 527 |  3 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
 528 |  4 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
 529 |  5 | import { TenantSignupInput, TenantSignupDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 530 |  6 | import { useState } from 'react';
 531 |  7 | import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';
 532 |  8 | 
 533 |  9 | export default function SignupPage() {
 534 | 10 |   const [message, setMessage] = useState('');
 535 | 11 |   const router = useRouter();
 536 | 12 |   const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm<TenantSignupInput>({
 537 | 13 |     resolver: zodResolver(TenantSignupDto),
 538 | 14 |   });
 539 | 15 | 
 540 | 16 |   const onSubmit = async (data: TenantSignupInput) => {
 541 | 17 |     const res = await fetch('/api/tenants', {
 542 | 18 |       method: 'POST',
 543 | 19 |       headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
 544 | 20 |       body: JSON.stringify(data),
 545 | 21 |     });
 546 | 22 |     const result = await res.json();
 547 | 23 |     if (res.ok) {
 548 | 24 |       setMessage(`Tenant created! Redirecting to dashboard...`);
 549 | 25 |       // Redirect to tenant dashboard (add to /etc/hosts first)
 550 | 26 |       window.location.href = `http://${data.tenantId}.localhost:3000/dashboard`;
 551 | 27 |     } else {
 552 | 28 |       setMessage(result.error || 'Error creating tenant');
 553 | 29 |     }
 554 | 30 |   };
 555 | 31 | 
 556 | 32 |   return (
 557 | 33 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-800">
 558 | 34 |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="bg-white p-8 rounded shadow-md w-96">
 559 | 35 |         <h1 className="text-2xl mb-4">Tenant Signup</h1>
 560 | 36 |         <input {...register('orgName')} placeholder="Organization Name" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
 561 | 37 |         {errors.orgName && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.orgName.message}</p>}
 562 | 38 |         <input {...register('tenantId')} placeholder="Tenant ID (e.g., plano-isd)" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
 563 | 39 |         {errors.tenantId && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.tenantId.message}</p>}
 564 | 40 |         <input {...register('adminName')} placeholder="Admin Name" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
 565 | 41 |         {errors.adminName && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.adminName.message}</p>}
 566 | 42 |         <input {...register('adminEmail')} placeholder="Admin Email" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
 567 | 43 |         {errors.adminEmail && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.adminEmail.message}</p>}
 568 | 44 |         <input type="password" {...register('adminPassword')} placeholder="Admin Password" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
 569 | 45 |         {errors.adminPassword && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.adminPassword.message}</p>}
 570 | 46 |         <button type="submit" className="bg-blue-500 text-white p-2 w-full">Signup</button>
 571 | 47 |         <p className="mt-2 text-center">{message}</p>
 572 | 48 |       </form>
 573 | 49 |     </div>
 574 | 50 |   );
 575 | 51 | }
